story:
Terror. Roof structure collapsed in the stadium Roberto Mariano Bula. (Delfia Cortez) Humberto O. Cornejo (Humberto.cornejo @ epasa.com) / PANAMA AMERICA! Fourteen year old Earl Agnoly,Jr was critically injured, when one of the bleachers fell on him. He was struck in the head, required emergency surgery, and still remains in the hospital! His prognosis is guarded at this time and he will require extensive therapy and specialized care, due to traumatic brain injury!  "We have communicated the dilapidated conditions of the stadium, in writing, to Sinaproc (the Panamanian Institute of Sports (Pandeportes), for two years and nothing was done" said Crespo, Director of the league. The child was training with hopes of making the National Championship, in the intermediate category.  We would like to finish the only ballpark available, to have a safe place that would enable the children to succeed at becoming future baseball players! We would also like to set up a scholarship fund on behalf of the injured player!

I've been in the Little League arena for more than 20 years! As a baseball mom, grandmom and a coach! My son started Little League at the age of 2 ( in a pamper league). My grandaughter and grandson started at the ages of 5 and 3; My grandaughter made the all-stars on her softball team, they were champions of her baseball program and her team were runner-ups for the district championship in the 9 and 10 year old division.

We were lucky to be part of Little League in the US! We had access to all our Little League needs, in a safe environment! Sadly, children in third world cities like Colon, Panama have the same aspirations, but not the same opportunities!

This campaign is very dear to my heart because this is the city where I was born and raised, and this is the adored stadium where I played softball, at a time when it was a safe place to play! Construction on two little league ballparks were initiated in the city but was not completed due to lack of funds!

I am starting this campaign to raise enough funds to finish the parks, set up a scholarship fund on behalf of the injured player and provide breakfast and lunch to the public schools and the community. Hoping to give these children the same opportunities my son, grandkids and I had, in order to secure a better future for them!

 Though Panama is a relatively wealthy country, the city of Colon is terribly neglected, due to a chronic and uneven distribution of this wealth!

Your contribution to this campaign will allow the injured player and his family access to  all the medical and rehabilitative services he's going to require! It will also be utilized to provide academic scholarships to the players and children in the community. 

We are requesting $5000 to get this project started. The campaign offers some awesome perks, such as: a weekend getaway to Vegas, a 7 or 10 day trip to Disney, prepaid credit cards, walmart gift cards gas cards and much more!

If we don't reach our entire goal, whatever funds we receive would be split between the medical expenses of the injured player and the food program.

We also intend to host international tournaments, in order to sensitize children in the US to some of the struggles of children in cities like Colon, Panama! Your contribution will help foster compassion, tolerance and acceptance of each other, across cultural lines! 

As a Social Worker, Special Education and Bilingual Teacher, I have worked hard to make a positive difference in the lives of at-risk children, in New York and Florida for over 30 years! Your contribution to this campaign will allow me to do the same for the children in my hometown! We would appreciate any assistance you can offer our campaign. If ypu're unable to contribute, we implore that you spread the word to as many people as possible! Using the Indiegogo share tools is a great way to spread the word!! We would love to thank you all, in advance, for any and all contributions to our campaign!

story:
YOUR HEALTH FREEDOM IS UNDER ATTACK. THE MEDICAL BOARD OF CALIFORNIA IS BEGINNING TO MAKE A POWER GRAB FOR ALTERNATIVE HEALTH MODALITIES. WE NEED YOUR HELP TO STOP THEM IN THEIR TRACKS.

Please sign, and pass on, our Change.org petition. Petition Here. 

5/4/12 - Article on Shea & Stephen on NaturalNews.com. NaturalNews.com article is here.

5/11/12 - Shea's interview with Dr. Ariel Policano on the Health and Harmony Radio Network. Shea's Interview is here.

5/29/12 - Shea's interview with Patrick Timpone on the One Radio Network. Shea's interview is here. 

6/4/12 - Shea's interview with Paul Nison on the Raw Life Health Show. Watch video here. 

6/7/12 - Nice mention from Matt Monarch in the Raw Food World Newsletter  
Raw Food World article is here.  

SUMMARY: 

My name is Shea Lynn Baird. My husband, Stephen Barlow and I own a complimentary and alternative health office called Every Body Cleansing Studio in Santa Rosa, CA. One of the services we offered there was Colon Hydrotherapy. I have been a colon hydrotherapist for 12 years, my husband for 4 years. We have over 2000 clients.

On March 22nd, 2012, an investigator from the Medical Board of California closed us down under threat of immediate felony charges for "practicing medicine without a license" – for doing colon hydrotherapy.

We find ourselves engaged in a situation, the outcome of which will either have a negative or positive effect on the future of all California hydrotherapists (ALL hydrotherapists nationwide, actually), and more than likely on all complementary and alternative health care practitioners.

If colon hydrotherapy ceases to be in California it will not only be one less healing modality available to you, but it will also set a new precedent for the medical board to unconstitutionally apply the law in other situations of their choosing – and the power grab for complementary and alternative health care modalities will be begin in earnest.

WE NEED YOUR HELP.

Our minds boggle at the fact that our state has done this to us. We didn’t go looking to be the face of this fight. This fight found us. We not only do this for ourselves – simply because we’d like to go back to work now – but we do this for all. Your donations can help us actually see this situation through.

Please sign, and pass on, our Change.org petition. Petition Here.

5/4/12 - Article on Shea & Stephen on NaturalNews.com. NaturalNews.com article is here.

5/11/12 - Shea's interview with Dr. Ariel Policano on the Health and Harmony Radio Network. Shea's Interview is here.

5/29/12 - Shea's interview with Patrick Timpone on the One Radio Network. Shea's interview is here. 

6/4/12 - Shea's interview with Paul Nison on the Raw Life Health Show. Watch video here. 

6/7/12 - Nice mention from Matt Monarch in the Raw Food World Newsletter  
Raw Food World article is here. 


OUR STORY - THE SHORT VERSION:

  • On March 22nd the Medical Board of California shut us down under immediate threat of felony charges, and up to 28 years in jail for "practicing medicine without a license" – for doing colon hydrotherapy.
  • We have been compliant with all guidelines set forth by the state, and the Medical Board investigator didn't care. 
  • We were told that the ONLY WAY we could practice colon hydrotherapy in the state of California was if we were an MD, an ND or a surgeon, or if we were an RN working in a business owned (51% or more) by an MD, an ND or a surgeon.
  • We were lied to, threatened and denied time for legal counsel. 
  • In the process of shutting us down the investigator made a threat to colon hydrotherapy as a whole.
  • At this moment we aren’t allowed to practice colon hydrotherapy and we have no income.
  • By default we have become the face of this fight – to protect colon hydrotherapy as an alternative health care modality in California, and nationwide – as well as all complimentary and alternative health care modalities as a whole.
  • It was clear within 2 weeks of the event that our Colon Hydrotherapy certification board was not going to help or support us in anyway. They claimed what has happened to us is an isolated incident, and have spent weeks distancing themselves from us with their language, and telling untruths about us. As of 5/6/12 it has been over a month since they've replied to an email, or we've even heard from them. 
  • After meetings with 8 different lawyers we finally found legal assistance who believes we have a chance to overturn the unconstitutional action of the medical board. He has a plan and he is putting it in motion. 
  • We are reaching out to you for support in fighting this because if we don’t reverse the action taken on us by the Medical Board of California, and if colon hydrotherapy ceases to be here, we know that the medical boards of other states will be watching and will follow suit. The medical boards will then begin their power grab for all complimentary and alternative health care modalities in earnest.
 
After several conversations with people in our industry, I realize there have been  many misconceptions and false beliefs about our situation. Realizing this has been both upsetting and eye-opening for me. It has shown me that even though I have tried to carefully explain the circumstances of our situation, people have a difficult time seeing beyond their own experiences and the assumptions they have formed because of those experiences. 

So, to be incredibly clear I want to cut to the chase and spell a few things out. 

THE MEDICAL BOARD INVESTIGATOR NEVER MENTIONED, NOR DID HIS VISIT HAVE ANYTHING TO DO WITH : 

  • Our website
  • Our advertising
  • The class of our device
  • Whether we had a prescription for our equipment
  • Whether we had a prescription for our supplies
  • Whether our clients had a prescription for our service
  • The situation in Texas or any other state

 WHAT HE DID SAY WAS: 

  • The state of California decided in July of 2002 that Colon Hydrotherapy is a medical procedure. 
  • The ONLY WAY someone can practice colon hydrotherapy in the state of California is to be an MD, ND or a surgeon, or be an RN working for (in a business owned at least 51% by) an MD, ND or a surgeon. 
  • That SB-577 did not cover us. In fact, we were told that the medical board doesn’t care about SB-577. 
  • That he was fully aware that there are several other therapists in our area, and many more in California, and that we were just first. 

 

MORE DETAILED VERSION:â€¨

On Thursday March 22nd, an investigator from the Medical Board of California walked into my husband and my colon hydrotherapy office, Every Body Cleansing Studio, and aggressively threatened and intimidated us into signing a cease and desist affidavit on the spot.  His threat was immediate felony charges for practicing medicine without a license, and up to 28 years in jail. 

The investigator backed up his claim with a copy of a “law” that turned out to be the 2002 California Attorney General’s opinion on colon hydrotherapy, which all California colon therapists believed was overturned 2 months later with the passing of Senate Bill-577. (I have been in compliance with SB-577 since its inception.) He didn’t give us time to read the paperwork and he refused us legal counsel. Under extreme duress (I was crying so hard I could barely breathe or hold my pen) we signed.

On his way out of our office he said, “I am fully aware that there are several other therapists in your area, and many more in California – you’re just first. “

Now the history behind this, in Cliff Notes version, is that the Medical Board of California has tried to do this before. I think it was about 12 years ago that they tried to end colon therapy in California. In July of 2002 the Attorney General released an opinion that said that the state of California has decided that colon hydrotherapy is a medical procedure. Two months later, in September of 2002, there was a Senate Bill passed (SB-577) supposedly amending that decision.  Out of SB-577 came a set of guidelines, called the State of California Guidelines (as part of the state’s Business and Professions Code), which allows complementary and alternative health care practitioners the right to market and practice in their businesses as long as they follow the guidelines. Since that time we have had a copy of these guidelines signed by each client and in each client’s file. We have been in compliance. This Medical Board investigator basically said they (the medical board) don’t care about SB-577.  They obviously also don't care about your 9th Amendment Right to self-treat.

(Note: when things quieted down in California, a decade’s long battle was started in Texas between the Medical Board of Texas and the colon therapists of that state. There have also been issues in Louisiana, Washington State, New York and several other states from time to time.)

THE BIGGER PICTURE:

So what does all this mean? In the broader picture I hate to speculate. The first lawyer we spoke to was actually referred to us by our certification board. He told us that it looks like the Medical Board is using us as a test case. They might wait to see if we go down easy – and if so attempt to restart their witch hunt on colon therapists and other alternative health care practitioners in California. He also pointed out that other states will be watching to see what California gets away with. His advice was to either A) go back to work and get arrested on purpose so we can fight this in court, or B) take the offensive and sue the state.  Neither of those options were appealing to us. 

At this point, many weeks after our visit from the medical board, there has been one other situation down in Whittier, CA, where the medical board attempted to stop a new practitioner from opening her office. Although that situation clearly has a very different set of circumstances, it had an eerily similar script coming from the Medical Board investigator who contacted her. “Unless you are an MD, or an RN working for an MD, colon hydrotherapy is a felony charge of practicing medicine without a license. We don’t care about SB-577.”

My husband and I have spoken to at least 8 different lawyers. The meetings have all been the same. They say, “Wow… that is terrible. I am so sorry that happened to you. But this is not my area of law. Good luck.”

But there is one other thing each of these meetings has had in common: every lawyer we talked to told us that it was of the utmost importance that we get our cease and desist reversed. They all said that if we didn’t overturn the action taken upon us by the Medical Board of California that the state would use this case to set a new precedent and would probably go after other colon therapists, just as the investigator hinted at. They also said that it could and would be used against other complimentary and alternative health care practices, and that other states would be watching.

At first we thought there was no way we had it in us to be the face of this fight. We spent a couple weeks obsessing over ways we could go back to work without a fight. Many, many times we discussed just walking away from the work and the clients that we both love.

Then, in mid-April we found someone to help us that has a successful track record of winning similarly themed cases. He has a plan, and we are already putting it in motion. For the first time we have hope.

Already the research being done on our behalf has uncovered some interesting information. Although SB-577 may not be the legal safety net complimentary and alternative health care practitioners, especially colon hydrotherapists, have all been lead to believe it is, we are seeing other defenses and areas of the law that can and will be challenged if we have the funds to move forward.

If we win this, the Medical Board of California will have to tuck its tail and slink back under the rock from which t came. Please understand that we not only do this for ourselves, but for ALL California colon therapists – and really for ALL COLON THERAPISTS AND COMPLEMENTARY AND ALTERNATIVE HEALTH CARE PRACTITIONERS NATIONWIDE.


WAYS YOU CAN HELP.

This situation will take some time before we even begin to see where things land. We have no income right now - neither of us are allowed to practice (even though I can name 20 other colon therapists in a 60 mile radius). We have started looking for a part time jobs. We need financial support if we're going tobe able to win this fight.   Your donations can help us actually see this situation through.

We need the following if we all are going to win this battle: 

  • FINANCIAL SUPPORT:
    Making a donation here to our cause would be very appreciated. 

    We have no idea how long this case will go on. It could be months and it could be years. We have excellent legal assistance committed to seeing this situation through. We are not being charged by the hour, rather he is willing to take what we can fundraise during the duration of this case. We feel incredibly fortunate that such a man is working with us, and we don’t want his generosity of spirit to allow us to become lazy about fundraising. We have no idea how long this case will go on. It could be months and it could be years. 
     
  • NETWORKING SUPPORT: 
    Please feel free to post our story and the link to this page to your friends, clubs, email lists, twitter, facebook, etc. We need as much assistance as we can get.
  • ACTIVE SUPPORT FOR TESTIMONIES IN COURT:
    We are beginning to collect a list of colon hydrotherapists AND colon hydrotherapy clients who are willing to join in the suit against the Medical Board to help ensure the future of Colon Hydrotherapy. 

    Please message me with your email if you are interested in being on this list. I don’t have any date or details at this point. 

  • IF NOT ACTIVE SUPPORT THEN WE NEED SIGNED AND NOTARIZED AFFIDAVITS FOR WHAT SHALL BECOME A COURT BATTLE.
    We are writing a generic affidavit that we will send out to you by email. 

    Please message me with your email if you are interested in being on this list. We need BOTH colon hydrotherapists AND colon hydrotherapy clients who are willing to sign, have notarized, and mail back an affidavit that will attest that colon hydrotherapy does no harm. We need as many affidavits as possible and from all states.

This is a numbers game, the more people we have involved, the greater our chances of success.

If you believe in what we’re doing, and you see how this will benefit all alternative health care practitioners, not only in California but everywhere, and how that in turn benefits you, please consider helping. 

It is not easy for us to ask for financial help, believe me. (We actually find it rather mortifying.) â€¨But we would really appreciate donations to our cause.

Thank you so much,
Shea Lynn Baird & Stephen J. Barlow

Please sign, and pass on, our Change.org petition. Petition Here.

Then, in mid-April we found someone to help us that has a successful track record of winning similarly themed cases. He has a plan, and we are already putting it in motion. For the first time we have hope.
Already the research being done on our behalf has uncovered some interesting information. Although SB-577 may not be the legal safety net complimentary and alternative health care practitioners, especially colon hydrotherapists, have all been lead to believe it is, we are seeing other defenses and areas of the law that can and will be challenged if we have the funds to move forward.
If we win this, the Medical Board of California will have to tuck its tail and slink back under the rock from which t came. Please understand that we not only do this for ourselves, but for ALL California colon therapists – and really for ALL COLON THERAPISTS AND COMPLEMENTARY AND ALTERNATIVE HEALTH CARE PRACTITIONERS NATIONWIDE.
WAYS YOU CAN HELP.
This situation will take some time before we even begin to see where things land. We have no income right now - neither of us are allowed to practice (even though I can name 20 other colon therapists in a 60 mile radius). We have started looking for a part time jobs. We need financial support if we're going tobe able to win this fight.   Your donations can help us actually see this situation through.
We need the following if we all are going to win this battle: 


FINANCIAL SUPPORT:Making a donation here to our cause would be very appreciated. We have no idea how long this case will go on. It could be months and it could be years. We have excellent legal assistance committed to seeing this situation through. We are not being charged by the hour, rather he is willing to take what we can fundraise during the duration of this case. We feel incredibly fortunate that such a man is working with us, and we don’t want his generosity of spirit to allow us to become lazy about fundraising. We have no idea how long this case will go on. It could be months and it could be years.  

NETWORKING SUPPORT: Please feel free to post our story and the link to this page to your friends, clubs, email lists, twitter, facebook, etc. We need as much assistance as we can get.


ACTIVE SUPPORT FOR TESTIMONIES IN COURT:We are beginning to collect a list of colon hydrotherapists AND colon hydrotherapy clients who are willing to join in the suit against the Medical Board to help ensure the future of Colon Hydrotherapy. Please message me with your email if you are interested in being on this list. I don’t have any date or details at this point. 


IF NOT ACTIVE SUPPORT THEN WE NEED SIGNED AND NOTARIZED AFFIDAVITS FOR WHAT SHALL BECOME A COURT BATTLE.We are writing a generic affidavit that we will send out to you by email. Please message me with your email if you are interested in being on this list. We need BOTH colon hydrotherapists AND colon hydrotherapy clients who are willing to sign, have notarized, and mail back an affidavit that will attest that colon hydrotherapy does no harm. We need as many affidavits as possible and from all states.
This is a numbers game, the more people we have involved, the greater our chances of success.
If you believe in what we’re doing, and you see how this will benefit all alternative health care practitioners, not only in California but everywhere, and how that in turn benefits you, please consider helping. 
It is not easy for us to ask for financial help, believe me. (We actually find it rather mortifying.) â€¨But we would really appreciate donations to our cause.
Thank you so much,Shea Lynn Baird & Stephen J. Barlow
Please sign, and pass on, our Change.org petition. Petition Here.

story:
My Healing Journey

I’m Kasia and I am a secondary school teacher from London. In January 2015 I am about to start My Healing Journey. A journey across north of Spain to the shrine of the apostle St. James the Great in the Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela in Galicia. I am campaigning to raise £2000 to help me pay for the equipment and cover the expenses during the pilgrimage.

Why?

Two years ago I lost my mum and my life changed. Everyday chores and work have helped me to get through the most difficult time. Now I feel I need some time for myself. I need time to reflect on what has happened and where to go from here. I’m embarking on this spiritual journey to find the strength and confidence to direct my life where I want it to be.

Where am I going?

The Camino de Santiago (the Way of St. James) is a large network of ancient pilgrim routes stretching across Europe and coming together at the tomb of St. James (Santiago in Spanish) in Santiago de Compostela in north-west Spain. I will walk the so-called “French way,” leading from the Pyrenees across northern Spain to Santiago de Compostela and the most well-known and well-travelled of the pilgrim roads to Santiago. I will start my almost 800 km long pilgrimage in Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port (“St. John at the Foot of the Pass”) on the French side of both the mountains and the border. The route passes through Pamplona, Puente la Reina, Estella, Logroño, Burgos, León, Astorga, Ponferrada and Sarria before it reaches the “City of the Apostle” in the western reaches of Galicia. It takes, on average, 4 – 6 weeks to walk. The route is extremely well-waymarked throughout but in winter it is likely to snow in the Pyrenees, the Montes de Oca (before Burgos) and parts of the Montes de León and Galicia or rain heavily in Navarre.

What are the risk and challenges?

As with any adventure there are some risks involved in my pilgrimage. First of all, I will be walking on my own. This is a conscious choice as I want to have as much time to think and reflect as possible. I am a sociable person so I’m sure I will pick up companions at some point but the aim is for me to walk to Santiago de Compostela on my own. The second challenge is the weather. I have decided to walk in winter. Probably it is the worst time possible but I shall enjoy remoteness and silence.

How will I use your money

My goal is to collect £2000 to help me pay for the expenses before and during the pilgrimage. Because I am not an experienced trekker of any kind I have no equipment I could use during the journey. I need to buy everything.  I need professional waterproof walking boots, jacket, rucksack, trousers, sleeping bag and other useful smaller things like compass, gaiters, flask, gloves, etc. During the pilgrimage I will spend £30 a day to cover for overnight accommodation and food. I also need money to pay for the travel expenses of getting to Saint-Jean-Pied-de-Port in France where I start my journey and then to get back home when I finish.

What can I do for you?

 I would like to make the best use of my time and in return for your support I offer to pray for you and your intentions on my way to Santiago de Compostela. Please specify in your comments what you would like me to pray for.

Thank you so much for supporting My Healing Journey whether it’s through a financial contribution or just getting the word out on Twitter, Facebook, or your personal blog.

Your generosity means the world to me.



The perks full of gratitude and love have finally arrived to My Healing Journey! There is a great variety of things I offer in return for you support! Don't wait and choose the best one for you before they're gone!

If you have any questions about My Healing Journey or the perks please write to me on myhealingjourneybykasia@gmail.com

Thank you!

story:
Hello!

Thank you for taking time to visit my page! This August I will be traveling to Ghana with the non-profit Water Access Now. Water Access Now funds water projects in village health clinics and other water-insecure sites that have little to no access to clean water. They also value sustainability and educate villagers on proper water use. The goal is to not only build the well, but also to maintain the well.

I will be getting to visit some of the villages and share in the dedications of the new wells. This year the dedications will be special because 5 wells are being built in memory of my friend Chris Dube who passed away last July. Chris was a dedicated board member of Water Access Now and of Esperanza International- the home building program we participated in together in Tijuana.  It is important for these in-person interactions to take place because it puts a face to a name and reassures the people of Ghana that we care more than just a dollar amount. I feel confident that I will return with a renounced passion for Water Access Now and a better understanding that WATER is LIFE.

This trip will be worth much more than it costs, but that doesn't mean it is free! The most expensive part is the flight. My goal is to raise $800, which would cover almost half of my flight costs. If you are able to help in anyway to support me - both financially & mentally - I would appreciate it more than you know! If you would like to hear more about the trip send me an email rae.christensen@wsu.edu or give me a call (206)2294664 anytime!
Thank you!

Sincerely,
Rachel Christensen

~~ To learn more about Water Access Now & my friend Chris Dube's involvement visit  http://wateraccessnow.org ~~

story:
Hi all

I've decided to run a 10k at the end of the month. I hadn't planned to do it for a charity as I know that money in tight in January and 10k isn't exactly a marathon. But then a couple of people said they'd sponsor me for the run so I've decided that there is no better cause than Umamanita, the charity that my sister Jillian and her partner Juan set up in Spain when their daughter, my niece, Uma was stillborn on 30th December 2007. At the time there were no charities in Spain to help parents grieve their babies, nor were the doctors or nurses trained to help parents in this incredibly tough time. The info below gives more detail on the amazing work they do.

I've met parents that Umamanita has helped at their annual Balloon Release Day in Madrid and while sometimes language has been a barrier I've been able to see what it means to them to be able to talk about their babies with Jillian, Juan, the volunteers and other parents. To acknowledge that their baby was a person whom it's ok to grieve for even though they may not have gotten the chance to actually meet them.

As Umamanita is registered as a charity in Spain I can't use a just giving page so that's why I'm fundraising through this website (it says £500 but this is just the minimum the website says, even if I raise £50 I will be thrilled).

Obviously all donations are very very kindly received. Much love. Xxx


Umamanita

Umamanita is a Stillbirth and Neonatal Death Charity based in Spain. Umamanita was founded in 2007 by Jillian Cassidy and Juan Castro after the stillbirth of their daughter Uma.

Why?

Like many countries the death of a child is taboo, understandably it makes people uncomfortable because they do not know how to react to or treat the families that lose a baby, more so when the baby never got to be a physical part of the family. But unlike many other countries the bereavement care quality within the Spanish healthcare system needs much improvement. At the time of Uma’s death there was no stillbirth association in Spain. Many parents are not allowed to see their babies; a baby had to live for more than 24hours outside the womb to be considered a baby and allowed to be named. The health professionals get no specific bereavement training when studying and the care parents receive is mainly based on luck of the hospital you are in and the staff that cares for you.  Although there have been changes and improvements across the board there is still much to do.

What does Umamanita do?

With a very small team of voluntaries we support families through our website, facebook page, monthly group meetings and our yearly babyloss awareness event Balloons to Remember.

We give seminars, talks and professional training to health care professionals and other sectors that work with bereaved families.

We have recently created our research department and after 18 months of work have launched the first national survey for mothers and hope to have a study published some time next year.

We try to create awareness about the importance of the social recognition of these babies lives, whatever their weeks gestation or age.

We act as parent advocates.

We work closely with the International Stillbirth Alliance and other national and international organizations.

What are our objectives?

We aim for health professional to receive the training and support to be able to offer adequate individual bereavement care.

That a baby who has died or is about to die is treated with the love and respect he or she deserves.

Promote empiric investigation with Spanish parents and Spanish health professionals.

For families to feel understood and supported.

story:
What is Dream Catcher?

Dream Catcher is an innovative product that lets you manage your dreams. Yes, this great device is all you need if you want to manage your dreams and record them to see them later over and over again. It makes the dreams brighter and more memorable, so you can analyze them later on. Imagine you are enjoying your favorite dreams just like watching movies in your home cinema to bring and feel all those awesome memories again. Great, isn't it?

"The average person has three to five dreams per night, but some may have up to seven dreams in one night. The dreams tend to last longer as the night progresses. During a full eight-hour night sleep, most dreams occur in the typical two hours of REM". (Empson, J. (2002). Sleep and dreaming (3rd ed.)., New York: Palgrave/St. Martin's Press)

But how many dreams do you remember? 1? 2? At the same time you can remember all of them.


Just imagine you’ll never see nightmares again, you’ll fall asleep easily, get up on time and, what is more important, you will have an opportunity to record and watch the most favorite dreams later on,  recall the brightest and the most colorful positive moments in your life: the first kiss, the first walk in the moonlight, climbing the highest mountain peaks... Everyone has their own memories and own dreams. But we give a unique chance to watch them again and even feel, no matter it’s only in dreams, the things you look forward to. Don’t you think it can make your life better? It’ll definitely change everything.


Recent Technology

Until recently EEG-based and brain management hora somni only covered the attempts to manage the brain rythms.

Mind machines, audio tapes, and other devices have been floating around. Each technique had its strengths and weaknesses.ButThe benefits of these devices are wide in range. Some people use them to relax or fall asleep, while others use the practice of controlling their brain waves to aid in meditation.


What's New in Dream Catcher?

Dream Catcher brings all these attempts to a new level. Apart from brain rhythms management and reach functionality outlined below, it gives a unique opportunity to manage dreams, making these brighter and more memorable. In other words, every night’s sleep can turn into a home cinema where you can see amazing colorful dreams. Besides, you will even have a chance to record them and to view these over and over again. Sounds unbelievable? No worries: these opportunities and technologies already exist today.

Take part in our project and enjoy your dreams!



Dream Catcher description

We develop 2 versions of DreamCatcher:

1.with emitting elements (Dream Catcher Pro), which provide a full control over your dreams

2. without emitting elements (Dream Catcher Lite), but with vibroactivators.

You will find the description of the main differences as well as some designed functional possibilities of the two versions below.


Dream Catcher Lite edition– Signal reception only (vibro actuator).

It contains reception sensors, microfonsand vibros as actuators, that influence gently to definite head points. This product version has no radiation sensors, which makes the device’s active influence on the brain minimal and does not affect its functionality. Below you will find short function description together with possibilities.

Snoring prevention.

Let yourself and those you love get enough sleep.

Snoring can be a trial for both the sleeping and the people around. Snoring prevention wakes you up gently once you start to snore.

Nightmares and uneasy dreams’ prevention.

Positive dreams are a key to positive mood throughout the day.

Suffering from nightmares or uneasy dreams? Getting too anxious about them? The Nightmares’ protection feature wakes you up even before a bad dream conceives – and you’re not going to see it!

Alarm

It Wakes you gently in optimal moment of dream phase.

How often do you feel challenged to get up in the morning, when an alarm clock rings? It means that the alarm wakes you up at the most inappropriate time, during one of the heavy sleep phases, when waking up is difficult. Forget about it! The sensor identifies the most suitable moment when getting up is easy for you, and the vibromechanisms wake you up exactly when you need to. Mornings have never been as easy and pleasant!:)

Dream memorizing activation

See as many bright and various dreams as possible.

We all see dreams; however, few of us can remember exactly what we saw in a dream. Why does it happen? The thing is, we only memorize dreams when waking up during the shortwave sleep phase happening every 90 minutes at the beginning of sleep with increased frequency in the morning. It’s also referred to as a REM (Rapid Eye Movement) phase. Sensors identify when this phase starts, while vibromechanisms control sleep deepness and wake you up gently at the end of a dream plot. As a result, you are sure to remember your dreams in all details.

Dream recording

Like a dream? We’ll record it for you.

One of the most innovative features of the system. As we know, the dreams we memorize arise during the REM phases, when electroencephalogram shows fluttering electrical activities similar to saw-toothed beta waves. That’s the period when electric activity of your brain is similar to the one of vigilance, and that’s the time when you see dreams you can memorize and then reproduce. Researches have shown that recording brain’s electric activity during this period of time and “reproducing” these during a similar REM phase in a specific way enables you to see the dream you saw before. The most difficult aspect is to separate dream plots between each other without any mistakes in order to record specific plots, not the whole REM phase. We are currently working on it and are going to complete the job by the time the device is launched.


Wave rhythms (log)

The whole brain in plain sight

Are you interested to know how well you sleep and when do sleep phase switch between each other? Wave rhythms’ recording is just the right way for you. Once you wake up and grab you smartphone or a tablet, you’ll have all the details about the way you sleep: when did you feel asleep, how deep was it, when did rapid eye movement phase begin, for how long did it last, etc. You can log this info in your smartphone on a daily basis to review and to analyze it.

Massage (relaxation)

Get relaxed

Get your head massaged based on one of the massage programs using vibromechanisms to improve blood circulation, get relaxed before going to sleep and get rid of headaches, if necessary.

Meditative music

For those who can’t sleep in silence.

An additional feature – so far we are not sure whether it makes sense to add it up; after all, you can use a player for music.

However, this option is possible and easy to implement.


Dream Catcher Pro edition– full wave control.

This version enshrines all the innovative features we’ve been working on for quite a while. Unlike Dream Catcher Light Edition, it contains radiation elements, and the device functionality is much richer. Dream Catcher Pro Edition are complemented by the following features:

Falling asleep generator.

Falling asleep made easy.

When you’re excited with thousands of different ideas in your head, it can be so challenging to fall asleep. That’s when your brain is too busy, you won’t fall asleep unless you calm its rhythms down. Listening to meditative music or counting sheep helps sometimes, however, these are not always suitable options. Radiation elements influence your brain with alpha rhythms – these are natural for your brain and come prior to deep sleep process. Thus, you begin to nod and then finally fall asleep. Forget about listening to quite music, tossing and turning or counting sheep.

Stop Insomnia

Say ‘goodbye’ to insomnia!

Forget about all your troubles related to insomnia. Now you simply need to go to bed, close your eyes and turn this feature on. Your brain starts moving towards a calmer beta-rhytm, you begin to nod at the alpha rhythm, which then results into deep sleep. Throw all you sleeping pills away.


Bright dreams

Let us paint your dreams

When waking up, few of us can recall the dreams we had last night, and even those of us who do forget their dreams within several hours. Occasionally, some of our dreams are so bright and clear that we can retell them in details even after a long period of time. “Bright dreams” feature is there to help you remember any of your dreams in color – you’re sure to recall what you saw even in several weeks. Make the world of dreams even closer to reality, try it out and give us your feedback.

Dream management

Realize your dream

Yes, that’s the conscious dream management you’ve probably read about on the Internet. To cut a long story short, whenever you see a dream, you start receiving some external signals, e.g., an LED begins to blink. You’re able to see this blink half-asleep and realize that what you see is just a dream. In theory, you are then able to manage it. The technologies used before are very rough, even though after a series of special trainings they led to similar effects. In this case no trainings are required: simply activate this feature, and Dream Catcher will let you know once you start seeing a dream.

Deep sleep (sleeping one’s fill)

Why don’t you simply get enough of sleep?

Have gone to bed too late and need to get up early? Most likely you’ll find it challenging to get up and will feel fouled-up and sleepy throughout the day. However, there’s now a solution to it, too. Activate the “deep sleep” feature on your smartphone, set the time to get up, and Dream Catcher will do the rest: it will make you fall asleep, get into deep sleep and minimize superficial sleep phases, depending on the remaining time before waking up. You won’t see any dreams, but at least you’re guaranteed to wake up feeling alive and upbeat. Canonlyhavearound 3-5 hoursofsleep? Itdoesn’tmatteranylonger. You simply need to go to sleep, while Dream Catcher will do the rest!

Dream stimulation (playback)

Play your dreams back

One of the most innovative features. You are now able to both “record” your dreams and to play them back. When you are in REM phase, Dream Catcher will stimulate your brain gently based on the frequency and sequence of the waves recorded. As a result, you will be able to see the dream you have already recorded. You’re not going to see a 100% copy, however, the general plot remains the same. Take your chance of going through the dream you’ve already seen.

Alarm clock

The best morning ever!)

Forget about music, vibrations, ringing and other noises or vibrating effects! All you need to do is to set the time of waking up on your smartphone, and Dream Catcher will do the rest. By the time you need to get up, it will move you from deep sleep to superficial sleep, and you will awake on your own – just at the time you’ve set on your alarm clock. You will wake up just in the right phase, and your sleep won’t be interrupted from the outside. You get awaken on your own only when you’ve had enough sleep, and from now on you can set the time to do it. Looks like the most sparing way to wake anyone up!

Choosing the scene

Choose the dream you want to see.

One of the most amazing things about Dream Catcher is that it enables you to choose the basis or the scene for your dream. How does it actually work? For example, you want to go back to the times when you were a kid, and need to recall the feeling of flying in your dreams; have a walk around a green lawn; or to meet a friend of yours. Choose any scene from the set, fall asleep and… enjoy the basis you’ve ordered. This feature is in beta-test at the moment, and, even though we’re still working on it, 70% of those testing the solution see exactly the scenes they have ordered. The number of bases is not impressive, but, as we’re moving forward with the project, we’ll be adding up new versions. Anyway, it’s worth trying, isn’t it?


That’s a short list of the features and capabilities you can take advantage of using our device. We are still working on it, testing new options and complement the system with the successful ones. The potential of active dream management is unbelievable, and we’re just at the beginning of our journey.

How it works

Giulio Tononi, a professor of psychiatry at the University of Wisconsin-Madison School of Medicine and Public Health, has discovered how to stimulate brain waves that characterize the deepest stage of sleep.

During slow wave activity, which occupies about 80 percent of sleeping hours, waves of electrical activity wash across the brain, roughly once a second, 1,000 times a night. In a new paper being published in the scientific journal PNAS, Tononi and colleagues, including Marcello Massimini, also of the UW-Madison School of Medicine and Public Health, described the use of transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS) to initiate slow waves in sleeping volunteers. The researchers recorded brain electrical activity with an electroencephalograph (EEG).

A TMS instrument sends a harmless magnetic signal through the scalp and skull and into the brain, where it activates electrical impulses. In response to each burst of magnetism, the subjects' brains immediately produced slow waves typical of deep sleep, Tononi says. "With a single pulse, we were able to induce a wave that looks identical to the waves the brain makes normally during sleep."

The researchers have learned to locate the TMS device above a specific part of the brain, where it causes slow waves that travel throughout the brain. "We don't know why, but this is a very good place to evoke big waves that clearly travel through every part of the brain," Tononi says.

The following steps were pretty obvious. If we manage to induce a wave similar to the waves produced by our brain during the process of sleeping, then we can create various visual patterns and influence the set of dreams thanks to stimulating different brain sections.

In reality Dream Catcher is a new generation mind machine. We refused from eye-bands, loud alarm clocks, LED and other elements, used by various developers for taking control over dreams before. Our product combines a set of sensors, reading electromagnetic  brain vibrations in its certain sections, TMS emitters, regulating and changing both the dream outline and the condition of brain activity, and a controller for accumulating and processing the information.



All in all, the device consists of 3 parts:

1. Headband, with reception sensors and emitting elements

2. A controller for processing the received signals

3. A program for mobile phones or a tablet for visualization and managing the controller.


The three components provide an unbelievable functionality of the system, a more complete description of it you can find in "Functionality" section.

We continue working on the development of the product, we know where to move and what to improve. But in our opinion, we’ve completed the most important task – we’ve created an opportunity. An opportunity to see the dreams we are interested in. The form, the design of Dream Сatcher, its additional functions... all the features are secondary and are steadily made better and even perfect later on. The key point is in the idea we implement.

A little bit about

We are an international team of enthusiastic people from Great Britain, Czech Republic, Ukraine and USA. We are keen on studying problems of human underconsciousness as well as dreams. Our team includes neurophysiologists, designers, programmers, and psychologists who are bright people producing and implementing ideas. We have been studying dreams and related processes for more than 12 years and we have been working together for more than 5 years. We focus on studying insomnia questions, working with lucid dreams, and managing sleep rhythms. 


Our first devices were fixed and connected to personal computer. By use of their sensors we read cerebral rhythms and studied sleep phases. Since then long time has passed. We have gained much experience; have worked out real mind-machine prototype equipment and devices that allow inducing lucid dreams and affecting wave rhythms of brain. 


All the devices got some defective features, sometimes even substantial. At last we have entered final straight. Dream Сatcher is a new-generation device. It is harmless and small as well as easy-to-use. Moreover it is designed to cause no inconvenience during sleep. Headband is made of soft fabric that wraps one’s head ideally.  The job has not completed yet. We have been carrying on testing period, exploratory studies and experiments aimed at balancing design, size and effectiveness features. We are passionate about our idea and are eager to develop a product that is close to perfection. And we believe that we will achieve our goal with your help.

And we need your help

Our goal is to obtain final product that is perfect and functional. To develop such product without your help is very complicated. We have been carrying on this project for three years. At the present moment the first prototype models have been worked out; further development has been conducted, and technologies have been polished up. There is still much work to do. We have to continue conducting research and experiments as well as to purchase component parts and to start up mass production. We are ready to work this way with you support. We would like to see that you are interested in this project and everything we do. We would like to know that you are ready to participate in further development of the project. We would like to underline that we work not for our, but for your benefit as a matter of priority. That is why we highly appreciate your vote as well as your participation in the given project. 

We would like to express our gratitude for your support. We will do our best to justify it.

Fancy Material
story_txt:
What is Dream Catcher?
Dream Catcher is an innovative product that lets you manage
your dreams. Yes, this great device is all you need if you want to manage your
dreams and record them to see them later over and over again. It makes the
dreams brighter and more memorable, so you can analyze them later on. Imagine
you are enjoying your favorite dreams just like watching movies in your home cinema to bring and feel all those
awesome memories again. Great, isn't it?
"The average person has three to five dreams per night, but some may have up to seven dreams in one night.
 The dreams tend to last longer as the night progresses. During a full 
eight-hour night sleep, most dreams occur in the typical two hours of 
REM". (Empson, J. (2002). Sleep and dreaming (3rd ed.)., New York: Palgrave/St. Martin's Press)
But how many dreams do you remember? 1? 2? At the same time you can remember all of them.




Just imagine you’ll
never see nightmares again, you’ll fall asleep easily, get up on time and, what
is more important, you will have an opportunity to record and watch the most favorite
dreams later on,  recall the brightest
and the most colorful positive moments in your life: the first kiss, the first walk
in the moonlight, climbing the highest mountain peaks... Everyone has their own memories and own dreams. But we give a unique
chance to watch them again and even feel, no matter it’s only in dreams, the
things you look forward to. Don’t you think it can make your life better? It’ll
definitely change everything.







Recent TechnologyUntil recently EEG-based and brain management hora
somni only covered the attempts to manage the brain rythms.
Mind machines, audio
tapes, and other devices have been floating around. Each technique had its
strengths and weaknesses.ButThe benefits of these devices are wide in range.
Some people use them to relax or fall asleep, while others use the practice of
controlling their brain waves to aid in meditation.






What's New in Dream Catcher?
Dream Catcher brings all these attempts to a new level.
Apart from brain rhythms management and reach functionality outlined below, it
gives a unique opportunity to manage dreams, making these brighter and more
memorable. In other words, every night’s sleep can turn into a home cinema
where you can see amazing colorful dreams. Besides, you will even have a chance
to record them and to view these over and over again. Sounds unbelievable? No
worries: these opportunities and technologies already exist today.
Take part in our project and enjoy your dreams!




Dream Catcher description



We develop 2 versions of DreamCatcher:
1.with emitting elements
(Dream Catcher Pro), which provide a full control over your dreams
2. without emitting
elements (Dream Catcher Lite), but with vibroactivators.
You will find the description
of the main differences as well as some designed functional possibilities of
the two versions below.




Dream Catcher Lite edition–
Signal reception only (vibro actuator).
It contains reception sensors, microfonsand vibros as
actuators, that influence gently to definite head points. This product version has
no radiation sensors, which makes the device’s active influence on the brain
minimal and does not affect its functionality. Below you will find short function description together with possibilities.
Snoring prevention.
Let yourself and those
you love get enough sleep.
Snoring can be a trial for both the sleeping
and the people around. Snoring prevention wakes you up gently once you start to
snore.
Nightmares and uneasy
dreams’ prevention.
Positive dreams are a
key to positive mood throughout the day.
Suffering from nightmares or uneasy dreams?
Getting too anxious about them? The Nightmares’ protection feature wakes you up
even before a bad dream conceives – and you’re not going to see it!
Alarm
It Wakes you gently in optimal moment of dream phase.
How often do you feel challenged to get up in
the morning, when an alarm clock rings? It means that the alarm wakes you up at
the most inappropriate time, during one of the heavy sleep phases, when waking
up is difficult. Forget about it! The sensor identifies the most suitable
moment when getting up is easy for you, and the vibromechanisms wake you up
exactly when you need to. Mornings have never been as easy and pleasant!:)
Dream memorizing
activation
See as many bright and various dreams as
possible.
We all see dreams; however, few of us can remember
exactly what we saw in a dream. Why does it happen? The thing is, we only memorize
dreams when waking up during the shortwave sleep phase happening every 90
minutes at the beginning of sleep with increased frequency in the morning. It’s
also referred to as a REM (Rapid Eye Movement) phase. Sensors identify when
this phase starts, while vibromechanisms control sleep deepness and wake you up
gently at the end of a dream plot. As a result, you are sure to remember your
dreams in all details.
Dream recording
Like a dream? We’ll record it for you.
One of the most innovative features of the system. As
we know, the dreams we memorize arise during the REM phases, when
electroencephalogram shows fluttering electrical activities similar to
saw-toothed beta
waves. That’s the period when electric activity of your brain is similar to
the one of vigilance, and that’s the time when you see dreams you can memorize
and then reproduce. Researches have shown that recording brain’s electric
activity during this period of time and “reproducing” these during a similar
REM phase in a specific way enables you to see the dream you saw before. The
most difficult aspect is to separate dream plots between each other without any
mistakes in order to record specific plots, not the whole REM phase. We are
currently working on it and are going to complete the job by the time the
device is launched.


Wave rhythms (log)
The whole brain in
plain sight
Are you interested to know how well you sleep and when
do sleep phase switch between each other? Wave rhythms’ recording is just the
right way for you. Once you wake up and grab you smartphone or a tablet, you’ll
have all the details about the way you sleep: when did you feel asleep, how
deep was it, when did rapid eye movement phase begin, for how long did it last,
etc. You can log this info in your smartphone on a daily basis to review and to
analyze it.
Massage (relaxation)
Get relaxed
Get your head massaged based on one of the massage
programs using vibromechanisms to improve blood circulation, get relaxed before
going to sleep and get rid of headaches, if necessary.
Meditative music
For those who can’t sleep in
silence.
An additional feature – so far we are not sure whether
it makes sense to add it up; after all, you can use a player for music.
However, this option is possible and easy to
implement.





Dream Catcher Pro edition–
full wave control.
This version enshrines all the innovative features
we’ve been working on for quite a while. Unlike Dream Catcher Light Edition, it
contains radiation elements, and the device functionality is much richer.
Dream Catcher Pro Edition are complemented by the following features:
Falling asleep
generator.
Falling asleep made
easy.
When you’re excited with thousands of different
ideas in your head, it can be so challenging to fall asleep. That’s when your
brain is too busy, you won’t fall asleep unless you calm its rhythms down.
Listening to meditative music or counting sheep helps sometimes, however, these
are not always suitable options. Radiation elements influence your brain with
alpha rhythms – these are natural for your brain and come prior to deep sleep
process. Thus, you begin to nod and then finally fall asleep. Forget about
listening to quite music, tossing and turning or counting sheep.
Stop Insomnia
Say ‘goodbye’ to
insomnia!
Forget about all your troubles related to
insomnia. Now you simply need to go to bed, close your eyes and turn this
feature on. Your brain starts moving towards a calmer beta-rhytm, you begin to
nod at the alpha rhythm, which then results into deep sleep. Throw all you
sleeping pills away. 

Bright dreams
Let us paint your
dreams
When waking up, few of us can recall the dreams
we had last night, and even those of us who do forget their dreams within
several hours. Occasionally, some of our dreams are so bright and clear that we
can retell them in details even after a long period of time. “Bright dreams”
feature is there to help you remember any of your dreams in color – you’re sure
to recall what you saw even in several weeks. Make the world of dreams even
closer to reality, try it out and give us your feedback.
Dream management
Realize your dream
Yes, that’s the conscious dream management
you’ve probably read about on the Internet. To cut a long story short, whenever
you see a dream, you start receiving some external signals, e.g., an LED begins
to blink. You’re able to see this blink half-asleep and realize that what you
see is just a dream. In theory, you are then able to manage it. The
technologies used before are very rough, even though after a series of special
trainings they led to similar effects. In this case no trainings are required:
simply activate this feature, and Dream Catcher will let you know once you start
seeing a dream.

Deep sleep (sleeping
one’s fill)
Why don’t you simply get
enough of sleep?
Have gone to bed too late and need to get up
early? Most likely you’ll find it challenging to get up and will feel fouled-up
and sleepy throughout the day. However, there’s now a solution to it, too.
Activate the “deep sleep” feature on your smartphone, set the time to get up,
and Dream Catcher will do the rest: it will make you fall asleep, get into deep
sleep and minimize superficial sleep phases, depending on the remaining time
before waking up. You won’t see any dreams, but at least you’re guaranteed to
wake up feeling alive and upbeat. Canonlyhavearound 3-5 hoursofsleep? Itdoesn’tmatteranylonger. You simply need to go to sleep, while
Dream Catcher will do the rest!
Dream stimulation (playback)
Play your dreams back
One of the most innovative features. You are
now able to both “record” your dreams and to play them back. When you are in
REM phase, Dream Catcher will stimulate your brain gently based on the frequency
and sequence of the waves recorded. As a result, you will be able to see the
dream you have already recorded. You’re not going to see a 100% copy, however,
the general plot remains the same. Take your chance of going through the dream
you’ve already seen.
Alarm clock
The best morning ever!)
Forget about music, vibrations, ringing and
other noises or vibrating effects! All you need to do is to set the time of
waking up on your smartphone, and Dream Catcher will do the rest. By the time
you need to get up, it will move you from deep sleep to superficial sleep, and
you will awake on your own – just at the time you’ve set on your alarm clock.
You will wake up just in the right phase, and your sleep won’t be interrupted
from the outside. You get awaken on your own only when you’ve had enough sleep,
and from now on you can set the time to do it. Looks like the most sparing way
to wake anyone up!
Choosing the scene
Choose the dream you
want to see.
One of the most amazing things about
Dream Catcher is that it enables you to choose the basis or the scene for your
dream. How does it actually work? For example, you want to go back to the times
when you were a kid, and need to recall the feeling of flying in your dreams;

from the set, fall asleep and… enjoy the basis you’ve ordered. This feature is

those testing the solution see exactly the scenes they have ordered. The number
of bases is not impressive, but, as we’re moving forward with the project,
we’ll be adding up new versions. Anyway, it’s worth trying, isn’t it?



That’s a short list of the features and
capabilities you can take advantage of using our device. We are still working
on it, testing new options and complement the system with the successful ones. The
potential of active dream management is unbelievable, and we’re just at the
beginning of our journey.

at the University of Wisconsin-Madison School of Medicine and Public Health,
has discovered how to stimulate brain waves that characterize the deepest stage

occupies about 80 percent of sleeping hours, waves of electrical activity wash

story: Let's get these patches made to raise awareness of what we are trying to do!
story_txt: Let's get these patches made to raise awareness of what we are trying to do!

story:
We're still accepting donations, now through InDemand funding, and we welcome additional donations and shares to help use build the power of cancer patients fighting the TPP and for access to medicines. 

Giant thank you to all who have supported this campaign. Thanks to your support, we met our initial target of $4500 in our first 60 day campaign. Big thanks to all who cared, shared, and donated. Special thanks to Wizard Window Washing for sponsoring the campaign, and all have given what you could. The campaign is still open for donations through inDemand, just use the links to donate!

Cancer Patients are Fighting for Access to Medicine

Hannah Lyon and Zahara Heckscher, that's us, both have advanced cancer. We are fighting for access to affordable cancer medicines. 

We found out that the Transpacific Partnership (TPP), if ratified, would include policies that keep cancer meds unaffordable for too many patients. 

  • On Feb 4, World Cancer Day, we protested and were arrested at PhRMA (the lobbying arm of the pharmaceutical industry) speaking out because PhRMA has pushed for text in the TPP that keep cancer medicine prices too high -- over $100,000 for some medicines.
  • Zahara was also arrested in Atlanta at a TPP protest where she told US negotiators not to sell out cancer patients. 
  • The arrests were important because they generated media coverage, awareness of the dangers of the TPP for cancer patients, and pressure on policymakers to say NO to the TPP.
  • We ask for your support to join the cause by donating to our legal defense and joining us as we continue to spread the word and oppose the TPP.


Help Zahara and Hannah Spread the Word: No TPP, No Death Sentence for Cancer Patients

  • Your support will help us defray legal expenses, create educational materials and videos about the effect of the TPP on cancer patients, organize future events, and recruit other cancer patients and allies to make sure this dangerous TPP will not become the law of the land for decades to come.


Help Fund Legal Defense, Activism, and Education

  • We updated the breakdown based on actual costs of our expenses so far.
  • We seek to raise a minimum of $1500 for legal defense ($800 for Atlanta bail fund and $700 for the National Lawyer's Guild for their ongoing support of TPP activists and allies)
  • We seek to raise a minimum of $2500 for travel expense, future activism and advocacy by cancer patients to keep spreading the word about how the TPP is dangerous for cancer patients and loved ones (includes travel funds for Hannah to come to court dates in DC, and political events on those dates, our new website at www.cancerFAM.org and event costs)
  • We seek to raise a minimum of $500 for educational videos, materials, and social media outreach. Already, over 300,000 people have seen our videos but that is not enough. With your support, we will plan more videos, handouts, and social media campaigns to spread the word and build the movement. We're currently making an action-oriented postcard we can use at cancer patient conferences. 
  • We stretch your donations as far as they can go. Zahara and Hannah's time is 100% donated. The National Lawyer's Guild attorneys are providing pro-bono for expenses not covered by the public defender service, enabling us to use more funds for future activism. When we travel, we stay with friends and allies where ever possible to reduce costs. Other allies and nonprofit organizations are donating time to help amplify the voices of cancer patients. Wagon Wheel Web and Rachel Heckscher's donated time gave us incredible support to make an affordable, streamlined advocacy website. 
  • If we raise more than the minimum, we can fund more activism and social media! More awareness = more pressure = more political power to oppose the TPP.


The Impact: How TPP is a Threat to Access to Medicines and How You Can Help Cancer Patients Make a Difference

The TPP is dangerous because
  • In the US, it would lock in harmful policies that make cancer medicines expensive, such as allowing for extended monopolies on new uses of old medicines; making it harder for government to negotiate fair prices; and special extended monopolies for "biological medicines" that give hope -- and new life -- to cancer patients. 
  • The TPP would export these harmful provisions to 11 other nations, especially harmful for low income nations such as Vietnam and Peru. 
Hannah and Zahara are "regular people" who have cancer. We help others understand this complex issue by personalizing the issue, and taking a stand against the harmful interests that are pushing the TPP. Your contribution will:
  • Help Hannah and Zahara continue to volunteer on this cause without the shadow of high legal expenses. 
  • Keep our voices heard in social media and other media -- so far including Democracy Now! The Thom Hartman Show, radio stations around the country, and even the Wall Street Journal.
  • Engage more cancer patients/survivors/thrivers and allies in this struggle.

Legal Updates: 

March 31, the judge in DC said she will drop charges if we complete 32 hours of community service each. Thanks to you for the legal support fund, and the National Lawyer's Guild for advice and guidance to help us get this outcome. We are now

* Completing the community service

* Waiting for our mid-August court date in DC

* Working on CancerFAM.org, a new advocacy organization formed with the help of those who support this Indiegogo campaign 

* Waiting for Zahara's Atlanta date to be announced

* Planning our next advocacy steps, including outreach at upcoming conferences for people with cancer.

Feb 25: Zahara and Hannah had their arraignment on Thursday, February 25.  We were assigned a court date for a hearing on March 31 at 10:00 am at 500  Indiana Ave NW in DC. A lawyer from the National Lawyer's Guild is serving as our attorney. 


The Challenge: Hannah and Zahara (and Allies) vs Golliath: With Your Help, We Can Win

We do not want to underestimate the forces against us. Our health is precarious, Zahara is in chemo. Both of us are in clinical trials of uncertain duration. PhRMA and the other big corps and politicians behind the TPP have funds and power. 

But together with you, and activists around the country and world, we think we can defeat the TPP: 

  • Already, many politicians right and left have committed to opposing the TPP, including most of the US presidential candidates.
  • With your help, we will get the word out to more people with cancer and Members of Congress, so when TPP comes for a vote, it will be defeated.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can contribute, please do by clicking on a perk. Even if you can't make a donation right now, please take these actions:

  • Like this campaign and spread on your Facebook, Twitter and other social media. See the share tools.
  • Check out http://www.CancerFAM.org and sign the petition to Congress today!

  • If you are a US Citizen, use the tool here to write Members of Congress:  http://action.citizen.org/p/dia/action3/common/public/?action_KEY=13117
  • Sign our letter asking the American Cancer Society to join us in opposing the TPP: http://tinyurl.com/SignACStpp

  • Educate yourself and friends about the TPP by watching and sharing the videos in the gallery and other links for this campaign and at http://www.citizen.org/tpp-public-health. 

  • Like https://www.facebook.com/CancerFam to stay updated. 

  • If you have cancer, or a loved one has cancer, and you want to join our new network for accessible medicines and against the TPP, please email cancerfamilies@gmail.com and we will send details. Also check out http://www.CancerFAM.org

Thanks for joining us and helping people with cancer amplify our voices to defeat the TPP.
