We ask for your support to join the cause by donating to our legal defense and joining us as we continue to spread the word and oppose the TPP.






Help Zahara and Hannah Spread the Word: No TPP, No Death Sentence for Cancer Patients
Your support will help us defray legal expenses, create educational materials and videos about the effect of the TPP on cancer patients, organize future events, and recruit other cancer patients and allies to make sure this dangerous TPP will not become the law of the land for decades to come. 


   

Help Fund Legal Defense, Activism, and Education  We updated the breakdown based on actual costs of our expenses so far.
We seek to raise a minimum of $1500 for legal defense ($800 for Atlanta bail fund and $700 for the National Lawyer's Guild for their ongoing support of TPP activists and allies) We seek to raise a minimum of $2500 for travel expense, future activism and advocacy by cancer patients to keep spreading the word about how the TPP is dangerous for cancer patients and loved ones (includes travel funds for Hannah to come to court dates in DC, and political events on those dates, our new website at www.cancerFAM.org and event costs) We seek to raise a minimum of $500 for educational videos, materials, and social media outreach. Already, over 300,000 people have seen our videos but that is not enough. With your support, we will plan more videos, handouts, and social media campaigns to spread the word and build the movement. We're currently making an action-oriented postcard we can use at cancer patient conferences. 

We stretch your donations as far as they can go. Zahara and Hannah's time is 100% donated. The National Lawyer's Guild attorneys are providing pro-bono for expenses not covered by the public defender service, enabling us to use more funds for future activism. When we travel, we stay with friends and allies where ever possible to reduce costs. Other allies and nonprofit organizations are donating time to help amplify the voices of cancer patients. Wagon Wheel Web and Rachel Heckscher's donated time gave us incredible support to make an affordable, streamlined advocacy website. 
If we raise more than the minimum, we can fund more activism and social media! More awareness = more pressure = more political power to oppose the TPP.







The Impact: How TPP is a Threat to Access to Medicines and How You Can Help Cancer Patients Make a Difference


The TPP is dangerous because


In the US, it would lock in harmful policies that make cancer medicines expensive, such as allowing for extended monopolies on new uses of old medicines; making it harder for government to negotiate fair prices; and special extended monopolies for "biological medicines" that give hope -- and new life -- to cancer patients. 
The TPP would export these harmful provisions to 11 other nations, especially harmful for low income nations such as Vietnam and Peru. 
Hannah and Zahara are "regular people" who have cancer. We help others understand this complex issue by personalizing the issue, and taking a stand against the harmful interests that are pushing the TPP. Your contribution will:
  Help Hannah and Zahara continue to volunteer on this cause without the shadow of high legal expenses.  Keep our voices heard in social media and other media -- so far including Democracy Now! The Thom Hartman Show, radio stations around the country, and even the Wall Street Journal.

Engage more cancer patients/survivors/thrivers and allies in this struggle.



Legal Updates: 
March 31, the judge in DC said she will drop charges if we complete 32 hours of community service each. Thanks to you for the legal support fund, and the National Lawyer's Guild for advice and guidance to help us get this outcome. We are now
* Completing the community service
* Waiting for our mid-August court date in DC
* Working on CancerFAM.org, a new advocacy organization formed with the help of those who support this Indiegogo campaign 
* Waiting for Zahara's Atlanta date to be announced
* Planning our next advocacy steps, including outreach at upcoming conferences for people with cancer.
Feb 25: Zahara and Hannah had their arraignment on Thursday, February 25.  We were assigned a court date for a hearing on March 31 at 10:00 am at 500  Indiana Ave NW in DC. A lawyer from the National Lawyer's Guild is serving as our attorney. 
    The Challenge: Hannah and Zahara (and Allies) vs Golliath: With Your Help, We Can Win  We do not want to underestimate the forces against us. Our health is precarious, Zahara is in chemo. Both of us are in clinical trials of uncertain duration. PhRMA and the other big corps and politicians behind the TPP have funds and power. 
But together with you, and activists around the country and world, we think we can defeat the TPP:   Already, many politicians right and left have committed to opposing the TPP, including most of the US presidential candidates. With your help, we will get the word out to more people with cancer and Members of Congress, so when TPP comes for a vote, it will be defeated.    Other Ways You Can Help If you can contribute, please do by clicking on a perk. Even if you can't make a donation right now, please take these actions:  Like this campaign and spread on your Facebook, Twitter and other social media. See the share tools.


Check out http://www.CancerFAM.org and sign the petition to Congress today!


If you are a US Citizen, use the tool here to write Members of Congress: 
http://action.citizen.org/p/dia/action3/common/public/?action_KEY=13117



Sign our letter asking the American Cancer Society to join us in opposing the TPP: http://tinyurl.com/SignACStpp

Educate yourself and friends about the TPP by watching and sharing the videos in the gallery and other links for this campaign and at http://www.citizen.org/tpp-public-health. 

Like https://www.facebook.com/CancerFam to stay updated. 

If you have cancer, or a loved one has cancer, and you want to join our new network for accessible medicines and against the TPP, please email cancerfamilies@gmail.com and we will send details. Also check out http://www.CancerFAM.org 
   Thanks for joining us and helping people with cancer amplify our voices to defeat the TPP.

story:
Short Summary


  • Hello. My name is Ernest Ehrhardt. I grew up in NJ.   I discovered a way to "reverse", "end", "stop" this disease characterized as "Type 2 Diabetes" "customized" all by a patients own urine & saliva.   Utilizing forensic science, I want to teach my proven proprietary scientific mathematical method that has already proven to help thousands, with NO side effects.  If you are reading this, you  probably know of the millions of diabetics, and pre-diabetics in the world and how it Kills and cost Billions of Dollars!  We hear it every where!  Even the co-morbidities:  Hypertension, High LDL, Dialysis, Cardiovascular conditions, eliminating toes and other body parts, etc.

  

*  An INTERVIEW with Dr. Ehrhardt:   PLEASE WATCH THIS LINK BELOW! (you will need to be logged into Facebook to see).  Email: Take2forType2@gmail.com if you cannot see or do not have a Facebook account).

https://www.facebook.com/video.php?v=4646539017790&pnref=story


  • IMPORTANT LINKS, VIDEOS, PATIENT TESTIMONIES NOTED BELOW.

  • AWARDS:   I just received the 'Higher Achievement Award' from the Naturopathic Medical Association, 2014; and the  International Academy of Biological Dentistry and Medicine, 2014 Speaker Award.
  • 2014:  I am currently a TEACHER at the  ADULT SCHOOL in Morris County NJ and Somerset County NJ
  • BACKGROUND/GOAL:   This campaign will help raise money to form & START a 501c non-profit organization. Paper work/formation will cost approx. up to $15k to process and file all paper work for a non-profit, utilizing attorneys & accountants.   With all the overheard, expenses & already treating some patients who can't afford it, I am unable to continue without some help.  My building was greatly impacted by HURRICANE SANDY.  I am STILL WAITING for insurance to get settled.  My current business was family owned, lost elderly parents who assisted greatly.  I am financially challenged now, trying catch up, after a domino affect from damaged roof, property & water damage in the building where I see patients and perform testing, etc.  I could provide proof of all to donors who want to schedule to meet.(Or I could just send pics via email).  The 'Take 2 For Type 2, would occupy a space in this building, along with treatment.

  • MY BACKGROUND: At 20, hit by a car, in a coma for 2 weeks. Had a TBI (Traumatic Brain Injury).  When I awoke, I had no idea where I was & what happened to me. I will spare you all of my emotional details, but I will tell you that when the doctors & nurses gave me meds, I ended up waiting for them to leave the room before spitting those pills out.  I do recall when in group rehab/ therapy, others with TBI getting pills, and they were all 'out of it'.  I did not want to be like "them", as they looked like 'zombies'  - just drugged out of their minds!  (I'm not saying meds didn't help some but that image stuck with me).

  • The doctors said I was in phenomenal shape and my history as a Boxer had helped save me!  I did not drink nor smoke.  I was into nutrition prior to the accident, but after, I was even more determined to get myself back.  Let me not fool you… It was a hard & challenging road, but I had supporting  parents as an only child.  8 years in therapy learning to talk & walk again and dealing with the challenges that come with a TBI. I treated myself via nutrition & supplements. NO drugs.  We all need to realize the human body "IS" AMAZING TECHNOLOGY!  I have a deep passion to thrive and help others!

  • My parents were Opera singers in NY.  As a little kid I remember going to other Opera singers homes & seeing many over weight people. There was lots of beautiful voices, cooking & eating going on!  Then one by one, sadly, they eventually passed on. I don't remember them getting 'OLD'.   That struck me!

  • My passion for health, nutrition, and treating myself for a TBI, led me to become a Naturopathic, then an Integrative Medical Doctor. I also have a degree in Biological Dental Medicine.   As you may imagine, it took me longer than most, but I did it and through my passion for helping others & over 25 years in the nutritional field, I discovered a way treat Type 2 Diabetes, customized, for each individual person, based on their own urine and saliva.  This is NOT a '1 size fits all DIET or Disease'.   I can perform special scientific testing and based on the results, tell a person exactly what 'they' need to do, WHY & at what 'time'.  Yes, ALL of that 'matters'.   (This instruction may be  very different for each person).

  • The specific goals of this non-profit formed, Take 2 For Type 2, will be to:
1.  Educate doctors and their patients on how to treat & end Type 2 Diabetes utilizing this proprietary method.  Also, to educate children in a different way and help bring awareness of nutrition, their bodies, their health, confusion and choices.  Please know there are NO drugs used.  I can actually help reduce and in many cases eliminate medication.  There are other companies right now who are calling on physician offices, telling them why it's important to incorporate a weight management program into their practices, trying to sell them their product lines along with it.  Remember, 1 size does NOT fit all.  We have PLENTY of PROOF!
2.   Validate this proven protocol via 3rd parties & expand existing studies per the NIH (National Institute of Health) guidelines & Publish results.
3.  Help treat those Diabetic patients without insurance who cannot afford to get help.
In order to accomplish the above, hiring staff will be the next step to focus on these tasks that need to get accomplished as soon as possible. We will work diligently to put together  Board of Directors including Medical Doctors who have already seen this method work incredibly.   (It's in process).
This is my current business: 

* PLEASE READ ABOUT THE EHRHARDT CENTER along with TESTIMONIES:  www.ehrhardtcenter.com  http://ehrhardtcenter.com/testimonials.html

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Dzg_u5C1yQ    PRE-DIABETIC Patient TESTIFIES of a SIGNIFICANT POSITIVE change in only 3 Short Weeks!! Increased Energy!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e1otz4CXdU0  Patient Reversed of Diabetes in less than 6 months after living with it for 15 years; with no costly drugs or harsh side effects! No more Sleep Apnea! Healthy Weight Reduction. Increased Energy/Stamina!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bf47d-PYYMs     Patient Testifies on the "care" she receives from Dr. Ehrhardt, and how that made a difference in her life. Weight Reduction! Increased Energy.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJSKF971cpI   Patient Testifies > No more Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) and head colds after 20 years. Increased Energy! Weight Reduction!

Below: A FUN Video at the Ehrhardt Center, where Take 2 For Type 2 will physically reside.  It's Time to take a SECOND LOOK at TYPE 2 DIABETES!  This shows many patients at an interactive Type 2 Educational Seminar along with special food preparation, and some diabetes 'samples'.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eW5Pq7NHUMY
  • The magnitude of what contributors will help achieve will be off the charts!!   If YOU, A LOVED ONE, A CO-WORKER, NEIGHBOR, OR SOMEONE YOU KNOW has Type 2 Diabetes then imagine helping them live 'Diabetes FREE'.  YOU have that Opportunity right now!!!   Wouldn't you want that for you or them TODAY? Do you want to live a longer healthier life?   Do you want to help save millions from loosing their lives to diabetes?  Do you want to help educate doctors and every day people with real, solid information that can make a difference in their life immediately?  Without drugs and the terrible side effects associated with them!  Without a risky operation & implanting devices that will automatically give you an insulin dose.  Does that sound like they are looking to end diabetes to you??  Of course not!!! Don't let the 'cool technology'  fool you!!  Let's get to the bottom of it now & teach others even cooler technology!
  • Our society has seemed to accept the 'side effects' as the 'norm' because we heard all of those crazy commercials over and over again!! We are being 'hypnotized' without even knowing it - made to believe that the side effect of some drugs could be a  'stroke' or even 'death' and now that is "OK" as long as Big Pharma told us about it ????!!!! -so  we can STILL take the drug!!!  Are we loosing our minds??!!!  NO WAY - THAT IS NOT ACCEPTABLE!!  LET'S ALL WAKE UP!!!  Ok.. Maybe not everyone has been in a coma, but I wish I could share an ounce of my passion for life I have since then with you :)

I don't know what it would take to have your personally donate, but I do know the many reasons listed above are real.  I have over 25 years in the nutrition/ food science field.  Please go to http://ehrhardtcenter.com/testimonials.html to see ONLY SOME of the Hundreds of testimonies I have from my current patients and Medical Doctors.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need a minimum of $7,000 to "form a 501c non-profit" called 'TAke 2 For Type 2' -meaning take a 2nd look at Type 2 Diabetes now!  It may cost anywhere from $5k-$15k Per  www.NonProfitElite.com and other consultants.   
  • The biggest perk is to HELP others END a disease in their body that would eventually lead to pre-mature death.  However, you can receive a 15 minute FREE consultation for you or a loved one with Dr. Ehrhardt, even if you live at a distance from Somerset County NJ. (Treats anyone from anywhere in the USA)
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal:  If we don't reach the goal here, we will continue to ask for funding and put all of the monies raised on here toward paying the fees of forming this non-profit and toward other non-profit . We may need to re-launch another campaign, as we did not spread the news on this quick enough.  Please HELP US SPREAD THIS ON SOCIAL MEDIA!

The Impact

  • According to the CDC (Center for Disease Control) www.CDC.gov 29 Million people have diabetes in the USA alone.  This does not includes the millions of pre-diabetics and those who don't even know they have it.  It cost Billions of dollars every YEAR.  It Kills! It must be STOPPED in EACH person BEFORE it's too late!!  When a man in his late 70's reversed the disease after having it for over 15 years, and seeing his renewed passion for life, as tears rolled down his face, all I can say is, it's time TO SPREAD THE JOY OF HEALTH TO MILLIONS WITHOUT DRUGS OR HORRIBLE SIDE EFFECTS! LET'S GO!
  • I have a successful track record in ending this disease in a number of my patients.  Again, please go to http://ehrhardtcenter.com/testimonials.html
  • Dr. E received Higher Achievement Award, September 2014
  • Teacher of Dental Medicine, as this disease begins in the 'mouth'.

Risks & Challenges

  • If for some reason we do not get enough money to pay for the non-profit paper work/start up fees, then we will continue to ask for donations until we do.  We are determined to start this non-profit to help millions.  We must be able to cover our other expenses TO KEEP the testing lab and facility first located at 31 South Finley Avenue, Basking Ridge, NJ, so any left over money after the initial 501C related expenses, will be applied to the expense associated with the testing lab and facility to operate, and toward hiring some of the volunteers.  
  • Right now, I have some wonderful volunteers who generously donated their time in many ways to help the facility operate; however, I am at risk of loosing some, as they need to get back to paid positions.    They are reliable trustworthy people and I need their help!   IE,  Rosemarie has a Degree in Medical Lab Technology - worked in a hospital laboratory for 8 years (Microbiology and Hematology).  She is also a professional who has a Hospital Medical Lab Sales background with a BS degree; and has nearly a decade of experience in the non-profit sector w/ a total of 20 years in Medical/Hospital Sales.   June, lives very close to the facility.  She is a patient turned volunteer,  a retired Vet, w/ a compassionate heart & carries a great deal of integrity and values.

Other Ways You Can Help


  • Please DONATE and PLEASE share this post, help spread the word, even if you can't donate.  We need help with spreading this on Social Media.  LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.  
  • WE ARE SEEKING MORE VOLUNTEERS: BUSINESS,MEDICAL,CONSTRUCTION, JUST ABOUT ANY BACKGROUND!

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR THOUGHTFUL CONSIDERATION AND GENEROUS GIVING.  I cannot stress enough here that this is cutting edge!! Let's help millions together!

If you have any questions, Please email Take2ForType2@gmail.com

Sincerely,

Ernest Ehrhardt, I.M.D.  N.M.D.  B.C.I.B.D.M.

story:
When I was a youngster, I had the lovely experience of having braces. Nine or ten months into it, I went in for a checkup and they took an x-ray to see how things were looking under the surface, as it were. The orthodontist was shocked by what he saw. Two thirds of the roots on my two front teeth were gone. The term, as I found out later, is root resorption. This, of course, was a massive problem. My braces came off that day, and I was fitted with a splint - a contraption glued to the back of my teeth that stabilized my two front teeth and anchored them to the teeth next to them, effectively holding them in my mouth.

It has been over fifteen years since that day, and I've had the splint ever since. It is now broken. I was eating something and it snapped. This puts me in a particularly bad position as my front teeth are already loose and it's only been a week or so. The procedure that I need will involve grinding off the existing splint, replacing it with a new one, and fitting a retainer to my bottom teeth to keep them from hitting the splint every time I bite down. It's going to be expensive. Relatively speaking. If my teeth were to fall out, fixing that would be upwards of six thousand dollars. I'm trying to avoid that at all costs.

That's where you come in. I am stoked that you are even considering helping me out, and have some delightful perks for you if you do. First, each and every donor will receive a hand written thank you note from myself. Drawings, poems, and songs accompany certain levels. It's a small thing to thank you for what you'll be doing for me. Please rest assured that even if the fundraising goal is not met, every penny of it will be going towards my dental/orthodontic procedure. 

Thank you for taking the time to read this, and thank you again for considering helping.

story:
English version at the bottom!



Für einen guten Zweck..


Es freut mich sehr, dass ihr den Weg hierhin gefunden habt. Ich möchte euch heute von einem tollen Menschen erzählen. Jahrelang war dieses junge Mädchen eine meiner besten Freundinnen. Leider wurde vor ungefähr 2 Jahren eine seltene Form von Primärer Ciliäre Dyskinesie bei ihr diagnostiziert. Wir haben uns seit einer Ewigkeit nicht gesehen, jedoch ist es an der Zeit, dass diesem Mädchen etwas zurückgegeben wird, was ihr der Alltag genommen hat. Ich möchte hier keine Mitleidsstory verbreiten, deswegen werde ich euch nicht viel darüber erzählen, wie es ihr geht oder wie lange sie noch zu leben hat. Wenn es keinen Grund für diese Kampagne gäbe, dann würde ich sie nicht erstellen. Ich kann euch sagen, dass sie jeden Tag Schleim aus ihrer Lunge herausgepumpt bekommt & das unter Vollnarkose. Ihr alle könnt euch bestimmt vorstellen wie es ihr dabei ergeht.

Was ich mir wünsche..

  • Wir können sie nicht heilen, aber wir können ihre Lebenszeit um einiges verschönern..
  • Dass wir ihr Dinge finanzieren können, die sie glücklich machen werden, dass sie noch Dinge erlebt die sie jeden Tag lächeln lassen werden
  • Wir Zusammenhalt zeigen und uns für die Dinge einsetzen die uns wichtig sind.. unsere Freunde und Mitmenschen.


An wen das Geld geht

Sie war jahrelang eine Bilderbuchfreundin der man alles anvertrauen konnte, jemand, den sich jeder Mensch an seiner Seite wünscht. Leider hat die Krankheit sie gezwungen vieles aufzugeben, ihre schulische Ausbildung, das Abitur vorneweg, aber vor allem ihren Lebensstil. Sie ist schon immer eine spontane Person gewesen mit der man Stunden verbringen konnte und jede Minute gelacht hat. Jedoch konnte man genauso gut auch seine Sorgen in ihre Hände fallen lassen und wusste zu jedem Zeitpunkt, dass sie dort mehr als gut und sicher aufgehoben waren. Sie ist ein Mädchen welches jede Hilfe verdient und deswegen wende ich mich an euch, mir heute zu helfen, ihr zu helfen. Das Leben ist kurz & kostbar, wir sollten versuchen jedem ein schönes Leben bieten zu können, gerade jenen, die diese Hilfe brauchen. Wenn sie mich fragt, wie es mir geht und ich sage, dass ich leicht erkältet bin, dann macht sie sich mehr Sorgen um mich, als ich es eigentlich jemals verdient hätte. Sie ist die beste Seele die ich kenne.

In letzter Zeit ist sie leider sehr oft an ihr Bett gebunden und verbringt viel Zeit mit dem Lesen von Büchern, sie verschlingt eines nach dem anderen. Rausgehen kann sie nur an guten Tagen, wenn Kraft sie erfüllt. Bus fahren wäre schon zu anstrengend für sie. Wir sollten ihr helfen, öfters Kraft schöpfen zu können, ihre Tage so genussvoll und schön zu gestalten, wie es nur möglich ist. Dazu werden wir jeden Cent nutzen.




Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Manche von euch werden sich fragen, was für euch dabei rausspringt.. mehr als nur ein Mädchen glücklich zu machen:

  • Ich bin Fotograf, somit darf sich jeder der  100€ oder mehr spendet über eines meiner Fotos als Dankeschön & exklusives Print freuen! (www.facebook.com/denidedicphotography / www.deni-dedic.com)
  • Ihr werdet miterleben, wie ihr einen Menschen und seine nähere Umgebung sehr glücklich macht.
  • So viel Dankbarkeit wie ein Mensch nur ausdrücken kann.



Noch Fragen ?

Wenn ihr noch fragen habt oder euch über die Authentizität der Kampagne informieren wollt könnt ihr mir gerne eine Nachricht hinterlassen. Ich kann euch zusagen, dass das Geld in gute Hände kommt und jeder einzelne Cent dokumentiert wird, sodass jeder Helfer einsehen kann, wo sein Geld hingeht oder was damit passiert.


Wie ihr spenden könnt:

Überweisung an:
IBAN: DE20200100200666566204
BIC: PBNKDEFF

Paypal:
rambomator@googlemail.com


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann


  • Teilt diese Kampagne!
  • Wenn ihr nicht spenden könnt, vielleicht wäre jemand den ihr kennt dazu bereit!

Das war es auch schon. Vielen, Vielen Dank..

Deni


ENGLISH VERSION:

For a good cause..

I am very happy that you've found your way here.. I would love to tell you about someone very special today. This young girl has been one of my best friends for years. Sadly, about two years ago, she got diagnosed with a rare form of primary ciliary dyskinesia. We have not been able to see each other in a while, but it is time, to give something back to this girl that life has taken away from her. I do not want to create a "poor girl"-story here, that is why I will not go into detail on this or how long she has left to live. If there wasn't a reason to start this campaigne, then I definitely would not do so. I can tell you this, she gets mucus extracted from her lungs.. daily & under full narcosis. I believe you can imagine what this does to your body.

What I wish for..

  • We can not heal her, but we can make her remaining lifespan a lot easier on her..
  • That we are able to finance her experiences, that will make her happy, that will make her smile every day.
  • That we show commitment to man kind and help.. our friends and our fellow human beings.


Who the money goes to


She has been a friend of mine for years, one you could only wish for, one that you could tell all your secrets and know that there was barely a better place for them.Sadly, the illness has had its effects on her and it tries to dominate her life. It forced her to give up on going to school and seeing her friends every day, but most of all, it has robbed her from her way of living. She was always a spontaneous person with whom you could spend hours with, laughing every minute. On the other hand, you could also trust her with your thoughts, feelings and worries, knowing that they are safe and at the right place. She is a girl that deserves every bit of help and that is why I am here, to ask you to help her. Life is short and precious, we should try to offer everyone a life worth living, especially those, that are in dire need of help. When she asks me how I feel and I tell her, that I have a cold, she is more worried about my condition than hers, more worried than I would derserve. She is the best soul I know.

In the past time, she has been bound to her bed, reading book after book. leaving the house is something she can only do on very good days, where she has more strength and vitality than normally. Taking a bus is already too much for her, so her power only lasts for short walks. We should try to give her the opportunity of feeling our support, enabling her ways to gain strength and vitality day by day, to make hers an experience that influences her life and that she will remember forever. This is where every cent will be going towards.




What you give & what you get

Some of you might ask what you get in advance..more than just making a girl happy:

  • I am a photographer, so everyone that donates  100€ or more can be happy about an exclusive thank-you print of one of my artworks of your choice: (www.facebook.com/denidedicphotography / www.deni-dedic.com)
  • You will live to see how your help makes a special girl and her family more than just happy.
  • So much appreciation that a human being could give.



Questions ?

If you have questions or want to inform yourself of the authenticity of the campaigne then feel free to message me. I can promise you, every single penny will go into good hands and his future will be documented, so you will always know where your money is going and what it has changed.



How you can donate:

Bank transfer:
IBAN: DE20200100200666566204
BIC: PBNKDEFF

Paypal:
rambomator@googlemail.com



Other ways to help

  • Please share this campaigne!
  • If you can't help, maybe someone you know can!

That is it.. thank you a lot, it is very appreciated.

Deni

story:
2658 miles... My name is Meegana and I wanted to hike the PCT before my 30th birthday. That’s come and gone and now this Virginia native who’s trekked the A.T., Tahoe Rim Trail, Kilimanjaro and Nepal is trying to hike off all those baked good celebrations we had after our hikes together. I’m lucky to be involved in the Fredericksburg community where for 6 years I’ve had the opportunity to share my love of the outdoors with countless classes, excursions, and gearing YOU up for the outdoors!

 

The PCT can take me up to 6 months with various mental hurdles including post holeing snow in Washington to enjoying the desert heat of California with scorpions.

 

The support from the community would assist me on trail and also support the Trek Relief who partner adventure travelers with global communities to collaborate on mutually beneficial and meaningful service projects.

 

I can’t wait to get back and share my experience from the trail after completing this huge milestone. I promise - I’ve seen “the movie”... I won’t throw my shoes. Thank you for your donation. Every dollar and donor matter. In the mean time - happy hiking!

 

Trek Relief: https://trekrelief.org

 

*Artist: The Do

*Song: Dust It Off

*I do not own the rights to the music.

story:
This is my first cookbook, and it has a special place in my heart.

I wrote it for all the busy people because I know what it’s like juggling a full schedule (and a baby!) This is for the non-chefs and non-nutritionists who just want to know what to eat and how to feel better.

Through assessments, science personal and clinical experience, I share protocols and healing recipes that will help transform your body into a safe place so that it can receive the food you need to heal.

Hashimoto's Food Pharmacology will be available on March 26th, but only in limited quantities. Please help me show my publisher that there is a high demand for my new cookbook by pre-ordering today.

I am calling on you, my dear community to stand with me and in one voice say to the publisher, “PLEASE PRINT MORE BOOKS!”

If we don’t rally together over these next few days, the publisher will only print a small amount, and it may take months to get this information into your hands.

Why is a pharmacist writing a cookbook?

When I was in pharmacy school, I found that food has a very profound impact on our healing and what we put in our bodies will either heal us or make us sicker. In the same way that we use pharmaceuticals to impact our biology, we can use food as our medicine.

I call this concept food pharmacology. Food can be a powerful ally in your healing journey, and it is important to eat the right foods to get the best results.

While I bring the unique perspective of a pharmacist into my writing, I am also a patient who has walked this journey too. My personal story is what led me to write my first two books, Hashimoto’s Thyroiditis: The Root Cause and Hashimoto’s Protocol, and led me to develop my Rootcology supplement line and a host of other Hashimoto’s solutions.

You asked, I answered

For a long time, you guys have asked me to create a cookbook with healing food recipes because many of you have tried countless diets without experiencing real improvement or have even gotten sicker. My cookbook is different because it teaches you how to support yourself through digestive enzymes, and proper nutrients.

FOOD PHARMACOLOGY is filled with tools, strategies and over 125 delicious recipes to help refresh your body so that it can begin the healing process. And while most of the recipes are quite simple, there are some fancier ones for those special occasions!

Creating to Empower

I love creating new material, and I am touched each time someone shares how their life is changed by the tools I share. Maybe this cookbook will help others who are struggling to make sense of their condition find hope and relief from their symptoms.

What if your own health breakthrough started with nutrition?

I invite you to join the narrative and to take back control of your health. I believe your story is special and I hope you feel empowered with the solutions I provide in my cookbook

But I need your help

Here’s a little publishing secret...it’s really expensive to print beautiful, full color books like my cookbook, so the publisher is only agreeing to print a small number of copies at first. Please help me show them that there is a high demand within our community by pre-ordering your copy today.

By doing so enables us to get this out to the masses, making it mainstream for the millions of people who have Hashimoto's, thyroid disease and other autoimmune conditions.

I also want to get it in the hands of doctors and other healthcare professionals to use as a tool in guiding people to wellness.

I need your help to make this happen...

What happens if the campaign is a success?

Then this book gets printed, and we celebrate! The publisher will give the “green light” to print more copies which will help reach thousands of people with autoimmune conditions who need this information to heal.

I wanted to make sure that our campaign backers received amazing prizes, so everyone who supports this mission at the $29 pledge level or above is guaranteed to have a beautiful hardcover copy reserved for them.

Plus, that’s just the beginning. I get to reward you with even more nurturing prizes from our exclusive list. Click on each perk for a full description and find the one that’s best for you!

My favorite is the No-Brainer because you get four cookbooks! One for you and three for your friends and family - hello holiday shopping solution :) This prize also includes the Root Cause eBook, the digital version of the Thyroid Secret, the Root Cause Reset, bonus recipes and the intro/first chapter from my book.

If not?

If we don’t reach our goal then the publisher will only print a limited quantity and the book won't reach the people who need it the most. The wait to get the book could be weeks or months long and the worst part? The book may never be printed in larger quantities which could mean that practitioners and doctors and people just like you and me won’t get this vital information. Please help me and join this mission to show the publisher that we want TONS of copies of this book printed.

Why Indiegogo?

Indiegogo gives us a platform to send a clear signal to the publisher that we are serious about wanting many copies of this book printed. Time is precious when you don’t feel well, and I don’t want anyone to have to sit on a waiting list, not knowing when they will finally get a copy.

The health legacy you leave matters

It may seem small right now, but what you make in your kitchen today will matter tomorrow.

What you put in your body day after day will affect the beautiful masterpiece that is YOU! And what you cook for your family will also affect them.

You can start making a difference right now by pre-ordering your copy of Hashimoto’s Food Pharmacology. Perhaps get one for a family member or a friend too.

How does this work?

I designed this campaign so that your support helps the greater cause, and you get fantastic perks. Each level is different. Simply click on each perk (on the right-hand side) for a full description. Then click "Get This Perk" when you find the one that’s best for you! You'll fill out your order details, including your shipping address (if the perk includes the new cookbook).

Be sure to check out the FAQs for shipping info.

Your support of this campaign will help make a lasting impact. Thanks for helping me leave a legacy for my loved ones. Together, we will make a difference.

I invite you to join the narrative and to take back control of your health. I believe your story is special and I hope you feel empowered with the solutions I provide in my cookbook

But I need your help
Here’s a little publishing secret...it’s really expensive to print beautiful, full color books like my cookbook, so the publisher is only agreeing to print a small number of copies at first. Please help me show them that there is a high demand within our community by pre-ordering your copy today.
By doing so enables us to get this out to the masses, making it mainstream for the millions of people who have Hashimoto's, thyroid disease and other autoimmune conditions.
I also want to get it in the hands of doctors and other healthcare professionals to use as a tool in guiding people to wellness.
I need your help to make this happen...

What happens if the campaign is a success?
Then this book gets printed, and we celebrate! The publisher will give the “green light” to print more copies which will help reach thousands of people with autoimmune conditions who need this information to heal.
I wanted to make sure that our campaign backers received amazing prizes, so everyone who supports this mission at the $29 pledge level or above is guaranteed to have a beautiful hardcover copy reserved for them.
Plus, that’s just the beginning. I get to reward you with even more nurturing prizes from our exclusive list. Click on each perk for a full description and find the one that’s best for you!
My favorite is the No-Brainer because you get four cookbooks! One for you and three for your friends and family - hello holiday shopping solution :) This prize also includes the Root Cause eBook, the digital version of the Thyroid Secret, the Root Cause Reset, bonus recipes and the intro/first chapter from my book.
If not?
If we don’t reach our goal then the publisher will only print a limited quantity and the book won't reach the people who need it the most. The wait to get the book could be weeks or months long and the worst part? The book may never be printed in larger quantities which could mean that practitioners and doctors and people just like you and me won’t get this vital information. Please help me and join this mission to show the publisher that we want TONS of copies of this book printed.
Why Indiegogo?
Indiegogo gives us a platform to send a clear signal to the publisher that we are serious about wanting many copies of this book printed. Time is precious when you don’t feel well, and I don’t want anyone to have to sit on a waiting list, not knowing when they will finally get a copy.
The health legacy you leave matters
It may seem small right now, but what you make in your kitchen today will matter tomorrow.
What you put in your body day after day will affect the beautiful masterpiece that is YOU! And what you cook for your family will also affect them.
You can start making a difference right now by pre-ordering your copy of Hashimoto’s Food Pharmacology. Perhaps get one for a family member or a friend too.
How does this work?
I designed this campaign so that your support helps the greater cause, and you get fantastic perks. Each level is different. Simply click on each perk (on the right-hand side) for a full description. Then click "Get This Perk" when you find the one that’s best for you! You'll fill out your order details, including your shipping address (if the perk includes the new cookbook).Be sure to check out the FAQs for shipping info.
Your support of this campaign will help make a lasting impact. Thanks for helping me leave a legacy for my loved ones. Together, we will make a difference.

story:
As the owner of a popular soapmaking blog and resource, some of the most common questions I get is about essential oils: 

What essential oils go together?

Where can I find essential oil blends for soapmaking?

How do I know how much of a blend to use in a product?

I've done my best to answer these questions through articles on my blog, like this series on essential oils that explains how to use them, how to blend them, and how to calculate usage rates. I've compiled 50 of my favorite essential oil blends created with my own two hands in an ebook that has sold over a thousand of copies. 

And yet, the questions keep coming. What if I could answer them in an interactive way that helped soapmakers learn and find what they're looking for easier?

This project is that answer.

Modern Soapmaking is developing an essential oil calculator that will accomplish all of the above, and I need your help to make it come to life! Soapmakers will be able to:

  • Search a database of essential oil blends by choosing up to three essential oils to find in blends in the library (The library will include 250+ blends from my own formulary on launch.)
  • Submit their own essential oil blends to be added to the library, with full credit to their creation. (Supporters have the opportunity to submit blends in advance and have them featured in the search results!)
  • Calculate the usage rate of any essential oil blend, no matter if it's their own personal blend or one from the library. (Usage rates will be calculated based on scent load per product category with consideration to current IFRA Standards.)

It will finally be easy for soapmakers to safely use essential oils in their products, and create unique products scented with essential oil blends! And it will be available to all users of Modern Soapmaking's website, free of charge!

    Essential Oil Blend Calculator Mockups

    Want a sneak peek into the development mockups? Here's what we're working on:

    The Find a Blend interface, where a soapmaker can choose up to three essential oils they have on hand to check the library of blends. Notice the Featured Blend at the top of the page that will randomly display one featured blend from our Featured Sponsors!

    The usage rate calculator at work, showing the usage rate information for a sample blend. Notice the alert about the restricted essential oils, and the scent load options! This is an example of a blend being used in a soap, but the scent load usage rates are customized for each product type (so a lotion, for instance, would show 0.25% to 1% usage rates).

    About The Perks

    Want more information about the perks than the little snippets shown to the right? I got you:

    $5 Perk: Thanks

    Every little bit helps! I really appreciate your help in creating this calculator for the soapmaking community! I'll send you a Thank You card via snail mail, to show my gratitude! 

    $15 Perk: 50 Essential Oil Blends

    If you haven't snagged my 50 Essential Oil Blends ebook yet, you'll snag it as a thank you! This is Modern Soapmaking's bestselling ebook, and has sold over 1,000 copies. It features fifty essential oil blends that I created with my own two hands, and have tested in cold process soapmaking.

    Please note that the blends featured in this ebook will be included in the calculator's library.

    $25 Perk: 50 Essential Oil Blends + Credits Page

    At the bottom of every page of the calculator, there will be a link to a page listing all the lovelies who helped create this calculator. And your name will be right there alongside all the others!

    Plus, you'll also snag my 50 Essential Oil Blends ebook as a thank you! This is Modern Soapmaking's bestselling ebook, and has sold over 1,000 copies. It features fifty essential oil blends that I created with my own two hands, and have tested in cold process soapmaking.

    Please note that the blends featured in this ebook will be included in the calculator's library.

    $30 Perk: 100 Essential Oil Blends

    Take home double the blends! 

    You'll get your hands on 50 *unreleased* essential oil blends compiled in an ebook, plus, my 50 Essential Oil Blends ebook as a thank you! That's a grand total of 100 essential oil blends at your fingertips. 

    Please note that the blends featured in these ebooks will be included in the calculator's library.

    $40 Perk: 100 Essential Oil Blends + Credits Page

    At the bottom of every page of the calculator, there will be a link to a page listing all the lovelies who helped create this calculator. And your name will be right there alongside all the others!

    Plus, you'll land BOTH the 50 *unreleased* essential oil blends compiled in an ebook and my 50 Essential Oil Blends ebook! That's a total of 100 essential oil blends at your fingertips. 

    Please note that the blends featured in these ebooks will be included in the calculator's library.

    $75 Perk: Essential Oil Blending Kit

    I've taught hundreds of soapmakers how to blend essential oils with hands-on classes. And now, you can learn, too! This blending kit has never been independently sold, and has been used to teach classes by me for over a year. (So I know it works!)

    You'll receive a full-fledged beginner's blending kit with study materials, exercises, and resources, eleven ½ ounce samples of essential oils, disposable pipettes, fragrance testing strips, a fragrance wheel, and a notebook to keep track of what you learn & discover!

    The blending kit contains enough materials for you and a friend to enjoy learning together! Free shipping in the United States! Unfortunately, due to postal regulations, this kit is not available outside of the country.

    $100 Perk: Featured Sponsor - PERFECT for a soapmaking supplier or teacher!

    Contribute an essential oil blend of your own and have it featured at the top of the Find a Blend page of the calculator (as well as at the top of relevant search results) for three months.

    A link to your website and any information you'd like to include will be prominently displayed on the blend's View the Blend page. (See the video for mockups of the page designs!)

    Featured blends will also be shared on Modern Soapmaking's social media periodically, including Facebook (15k+ fans), Twitter (1.4k), Instagram (1.5k), and newsletter (5k).

    This perk is PERFECT for a soapmaking supplier or teacher!

    $1000 Perk: Super Sponsor - PERFECT for a soapmaking supplier or teacher!

    Sponsor the whole shebang and snag a 768 x 90 banner ad and link featured on the bottom of every single page of the calculator for a whole year. (See the video for mockups of the page designs!)

    A link to your website and any information you'd like to include will be prominently displayed above the banner advertisement, thanking you for your sponsorship.

    Where's the Money Going

    The development of this calculator is being contracted with an expert developer who is known for both security and proper standards compliant coding. This will ensure the calculator will both be secure and safe for Modern Soapmaking and it's users, as well as reliable!

    The current estimated cost for the project is $5,000 to $8,000, as well as hundreds of hours from myself to load content. Modern Soapmaking's hosting and other expenses are currently covered by our Patreon campaign (totalling to $1900/month), and waiting until we save leftover cash each month from Patreon will take several months to reach our needed funds.

    Your support of the Essential Oil Blend Calculator here on Indiegogo means that a launch date in October/November 2016 is possible!

    If we don't reach the funding goal, Modern Soapmaking will use any funds raised for the development of the calculator and will move forward with an extended timeline for launch. Meaning this will happen, no matter what! ;)

    Why This is Important

    This essential oil blend calculator will rock the soapmaking community from top to bottom, providing a valuable resource that can help everyone. Soapmakers from all experience levels ask for help in this arena, and I think that this project can make a huge impact.

    I have been planning this project for over a year, as I know how valuable it will be for the community. I couldn't be more excited to finally be bringing it to life!

    If you have ever wondered what essential oils to use, how to blend them, or how much you can use in a product, this calculator would have saved you hours of research. Think about the number of times you've seen those questions asked in forums, groups, and chats! 

    Let's gift those essential oil blending/usage answers forward to soapmakers in the future!

    Risks & Challenges

    This isn't my first crowdfunding rodeo, and it's certainly not my first time working with web developers and major website projects. (Once upon a time, I was on the other side of the table as a freelance designer!)

    Technical issues can (and do) crop up on large projects, and this calculator may not be an exception, but I'm doing everything I can to ensure it is. Full mockups have been completed, and a roadmap with detailed planning is in place. 

    The initial development will take place offline, and will be brought live on Modern Soapmaking as soon as all the kinks are worked out. With full funding, the project timeline should place launch in October/November 2016. 

    Project updates will be posted here as we move forward, so you can peek behind the scenes.

    All perks ($5 to $75) are ready to go and guaranteed, there isn't any possible way (*knock on wood*) for them to go sideways! The top tier perks that reward supporters with exclusive features on the calculator will be implemented for launch - the only issue may be a delay in the development timeline. If that does happen, we'll definitely get in touch!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you want to help but can't contribute, please consider:

    • Telling other soapmakers about this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools, especially via social media like Facebook
    • Sharing Modern Soapmaking with other soapmakers to help grow the community

story:
Mindfulness Retreat for Veterans

As our veterans of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan are coming home, they are bringing with them the invisible wounds of war -- traumatic brain injury, post-traumatic stress and memories of experiences that many of us can never imagine.

Evidence increasingly shows that mind-body practices, such as meditation, trauma-informed yoga and TRE (trauma releasing exercises), offer hope for those struggling with anger, isolation, suicidal ideation and other manifestations of trauma.

This fall, November 5-9, 2014, monastic and lay members of our community, led by Brother Phap Uyen (Brother Michael), himself a veteran of Desert Storm/Desert Shield, will offer a retreat in the Plum Village tradition, based on their own experience of mindfulness as a transformative and healing practice.  Together they will share with more recent veterans practices that will help them to truly come home.

We need your support!

Be a part of this healing journey.  Your support will enable us to offer scholarships to veterans and assist them with travel costs, as well as assist with travel expenses for specialists with expertise in various healing modalities, such as trauma-sensitive yoga, TRE and Reiki.

Every dollar you donate makes a difference.  All funds raised through this campaign will support this retreat and the veterans attending.

The Impact

Please help us make a difference in the lives of the many veterans struggling to rebuild their lives after they return home.  Be a part of the healing process, as veterans learn how to let go of their anger, heal relationships, and find peace in the present moment.

    Planting Seeds

    We hope this year's retreat will plant the seeds for future retreats to bring healing to our veterans, and our society.  Please let your friends and family know of this campaign, and of the difference they can make in the lives of those who have served their country.

    With gratitude from all of us on the Retreat Planning Team!

story:
About Mederi

It all started about twelve years ago, when we opened our little clinic in Calgary, Alberta. We were providing homeopathic remedies for everyday health concerns, but even more than that, we created a space for our clients to come and feel comfortable talking about their concerns and struggles. We started to understand that medicine is everything from a hug, or listening, to finding the right remedy. Whether it was seasonal allergies, a stubborn cough, or a screaming baby at 3 am, we were able to provide relief to our clients when they needed it most.

Our mission was to be able to share both relief and health with families all across Canada, but being just one clinic limited our reach. After more than a decade of prescribing homeopathic remedies, we started to create formulas that use the remedies that our clients consistently have success with, and are bringing them to you as the Mederi family of products.

Mederi is a Latin word that means "to heal" and it is the word that medicine is derived from. Our philosophy is that medicine should be simple, effective, and trustworthy, without any harmful chemicals or harsh side-effects. Hippocrates said "let your food be your medicine," and we have created the Mederi family of products to be as safe and wholesome as the food your give your family.


What We Need & What You Get

We learned what it takes to launch a new product with Mozi-Q, but launching a complete line of 10 products is an entirely new experience. Our packaging is printed, we have Health Canada approval, our website is ready, but we need some help to get our first run of the products completed and on to store shelves.

We are looking to raise a total of $50,000 to help with the final production run. Any additional funds will be used to help develop new products and allow us to work on bringing Mederi to the international market.

By contributing to this campaign, not only do you become part of the story of the Mederi family of products, but our perks give you the opportunity to pre-order the Mederi line. Once the products are manufactured, we will ship your order out to you.

Why you should help

Hi, my name is Kim and I'm the Operations Manager for Xerion Dispensary. I've had the pleasure of working with Erin for the past year, but she has been one of my best friends for a long time. While most people would just describe her as an entrepreneur, the first words that come to mind when I think of Erin are "helper" and "nurturer". Erin is driven by passion - at first it may seem like that passion is for business and homeopathy, but if you look a little closer, you'll see that her passion is really all about helping others. It doesn't matter if you're her best friend or a complete stranger, Erin will find a way to help make your life better.

In the 12 years she's been in business, her success has been measured by the stories of the lives she's impacted and people she's helped. The couch in her clinic became a sacred space where people could just sit and talk about whatever they needed to get off their chest. Erin learned that sometimes, a hug and a chance to be heard is the most effective medicine, and this philosophy has been central to Xerion Dispensary.

When the Health Canada submission number came in for Mozi-Q, we celebrated. It was the start of a new adventure, but more importantly it was a chance to help people who couldn't make it into the clinic.

I came on board because I believed in Erin and wanted to help her succeed, but it didn't take long for me to fall in love with what I had gotten myself into. In my first week, I ended up talking to a woman who called, ecstatic that Mozi-Q was so effective for her. We ended up talking for 30 minutes, and she told me that after her father died of West Nile, Mozi-Q gave her hope that other families wouldn't have to go through what she did. As I listened to her story I started to cry, and by the time I hung up the phone I was inspired. I understood that it wasn't about ego or recognition, our goal was to make a difference and have an impact.

Mederi is the next step in our journey. We've talked a lot about how we could bring the clinic and its couch to people around the world, and the formulas of the Mederi products are the closest we can get to bottling up that experience. We have regulatory approval and packaging, but we need your help to get the first run of products made. If you have sat on our couch and been helped out, or are just inspired to share an experience like that with others, please contribute to our project.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you aren't able to contribute to our campaign but are still interested in helping us out, please share this page with others.

Mederi is a Latin word that means "to heal" and it
is the word that medicine is derived from. Our philosophy is that medicine should be simple, effective, and trustworthy,
without any harmful chemicals or harsh side-effects. Hippocrates said "let
your food be your medicine," and we have created the Mederi family of
products to be as safe and wholesome as the food your give your family.


   What We Need & What You Get 
We learned what it takes to launch a new product with
Mozi-Q, but launching a complete line of 10 products is an entirely new
experience. Our packaging is printed, we have Health Canada approval, our website is ready, but we need some
help to get our first run of the products completed and on to store shelves.
We are looking to raise a total of $50,000 to help with the final production run. Any additional funds will be used to help develop new products and allow us to work on bringing Mederi to the international market.
By contributing to this campaign, not only do you become part of the story of the Mederi family of products, but our perks give you the opportunity to pre-order the Mederi line. Once the products are manufactured, we will ship your order out to you.

Why you should help 
Hi, my name is Kim and I'm the Operations Manager for Xerion
Dispensary. I've had the pleasure of working with Erin for the past year, but
she has been one of my best friends for a long time. While most people would
just describe her as an entrepreneur, the first words that come to mind when I
think of Erin are "helper" and "nurturer". Erin is driven
by passion - at first it may seem like that passion is for business and homeopathy,
but if you look a little closer, you'll see that her passion is really all
about helping others. It doesn't matter if you're her best friend or a complete
stranger, Erin will find a way to help make your life better.
In the 12 years she's been in business, her success has been
measured by the stories of the lives she's impacted and people she's helped.
The couch in her clinic became a sacred space where people could just sit and talk
about whatever they needed to get off their chest. Erin learned that sometimes,
a hug and a chance to be heard is the most effective medicine, and this
philosophy has been central to Xerion Dispensary.
When the Health Canada submission number came in for Mozi-Q,
we celebrated. It was the start of a new adventure, but more importantly it was
a chance to help people who couldn't make it into the clinic.
I came on board because I believed in Erin and wanted to
help her succeed, but it didn't take long for me to fall in love with what I
had gotten myself into. In my first week, I ended up talking to a woman who
called, ecstatic that Mozi-Q was so effective for her. We ended up talking for
30 minutes, and she told me that after her father died of West Nile, Mozi-Q
gave her hope that other families wouldn't have to go through what she did. As
I listened to her story I started to cry, and by the time I hung up the phone I
was inspired. I understood that it wasn't about ego or recognition, our goal
was to make a difference and have an impact.
Mederi is the next step in our journey. We've talked a lot
about how we could bring the clinic and its couch to people around the world,
and the formulas of the Mederi products are the closest we can get to bottling
up that experience. We have regulatory approval and packaging, but we need your
help to get the first run of products made. If you have sat on our couch and
been helped out, or are just inspired to share an experience like that with
others, please contribute to our project.
  Other Ways You Can Help If you aren't able to contribute to our campaign but are still interested in helping us out, please share this page with others.

story:
As a graduate student studying a specific protein involved in new blood vessel formation inherently expressed by cancerous tumors. 

I would like to get 4-8 million people (more would be better of course) to donate to cancer research, and in the process, fund the last year of my graduate research in the fight against cancer!

My goals are simple really:

1) Ask people for spare change to help pay my graduate research project for the next year which is involved in targeting and understanding an angiogenic inducer called CCN1.  My research is laying the groundwork on understanding this protein as a target to prevent or halt blood vessel formation inherent with tumor blood supply.

2) Give back a portion of the funds towards various cancer foundations based upon the tiers by which people donate.

3) Attempt to make the Guinness book of world records for the largest number of donations received through crowd funding (yeah... it's a lofty goal but why not?).

So how do I plan to accomplish this?

Simple:

I have developed tiers by which you can donate and the various tiers will dictate how the money is allocated and where the thanks or other silly stuff I will do will come into play.

**** I'd have made perk goals, but you can't make perk goals at less than 1 dollar - so pay attention and read below!****


Tier 1

Make a 1 dollar donation.  I will contribute 50% of this to Boston Children's Hospital in Boston, MA to help the kids with cancer!  The other 50% will go towards travel to get there to deliver the money + pay a portion of my graduate research.  As proof of contribution, I will video record a small ceremony of sorts where I hand a check to the powers at be at Boston Children's Hospital and post the link hosted by YouTube.


Tier 2

Ready for this? Make a 2 dollar donation! Woah.... hold you back right? With a 2 dollar donation, I will keep 25% of that for my graduate research project and the other 75% which will be donated direct to Boston Children's Hospital in Boston, MA. Help this kid... and you help all those kids as well!! Many of them are cancer patients, and so the money will be directed to those labs and such conducting research in treating children's cancer as well as a perhaps a trust put aside to help those families who need assistance with paying for those treatments for their children. No child should have to suffer at such a young age like they do... nor should the families! Imagine if 1 million people gave 2 dollars... that would be ~1.5 million dollars given direct to the hospital and the families of those patients!!

As proof of payment, I will video record a small ceremony in which I hand a check to the powers at be at Boston Children's Hospital and post to YouTube and link share to everyone.  In addition to that, if my stretch goal is met, I will allow a group of the children at the hospital shave my head personally as a sign of my sincerity to help them fight cancer!

Tier 3

Make a 2 dollar donation. Two whole Ben Franklin bill will be allocated in the same manner as above. 25% to my graduate research with the other 75% going direct towards Susan G. Komen foundation!

5005 LBJ Freeway, Suite 250

Dallas, TX 75244

Yup... 150 cents of every 2 dollar donation will go direct to them in their efforts in fighting breast cancer!

As proof of payment, I will video record a small ceremony in which I hand a check to the powers at be to a local Susan G. Komen Foundation Location or, if my stretch goal is met, I will fly down to Dallas and deliver the check directly to their main branch office.  Additionally, if my stretch goal is met, I will paint my hair pink for one month as a sign of my contribution to fight breast cancer (afterwhich I will shave it off for the kids at Boston Children's Hospital as per Tier 2)


Tier 4

Make a 5 dollar donation. Again, 25% will be kept by me and put towards my graduate research, the other 75% will go direct to the Ovarian Cancer Research Fund

14 Pennsylvania Plaza, Suite 1710

New York, NY 10122

Of the 20,000 women who are diagnosed yearly, 15,000 of them die due to lack of detection and early diagnosis. Sad, but this is one type of cancer that goes very unnoticed, and I wish to put my time and efforts into this more as this is the inspiration of my current graduate research.

As proof of payment, I will video record a small ceremony in which I hand a check to the powers at be of the Ovarian Cancer Research Fund  and post to YouTube and link share to everyone.  + if my stretch goal is met, I will do some silly snow challenge thing or something - perhaps you can make a suggestion and I will do what the contributors ask!



Tier 5

Anything over 100 dollars - I will give 95% (yes... 95%) of donations at or above this dollar amount to the American Cancer Society.

250 Williams Street NW

Atlanta, GA 30303

It's pretty straight forward what they do there, and since I will be keeping no more than 5 dollars for every 100, the money I keep will more or less go to gas and other expenditures of time and so forth in coordinating all of the aforementioned Tiers.

As proof of payment, I will video record a small ceremony in which I hand a check to the powers at be of the American Cancer Society and post to YouTube and link share to everyone.  + if my stretch goal is met, I will do some silly snow challenge thing or something - perhaps you can make a suggestion and I will do what the contributors ask!




In addition to paying for my last year to year and a half as a graduate student conducting research of the CCN1 protein involved with blood vessel formation that supplies cancerous tumors, if enough money comes through, I also plan to setup trust funds/scholarship money for those students that wish to further explore this type of science and research at the local university. 

Honestly, I could care less if this brings me some type of fame or whatever. I am not doing this for fame... I am doing this for practicality - to collect the change on the floor of your car or between the seats of your sofa and put it to practical and good use! Let's take that change and actually make a change with it by fighting cancer (and paying off my student debt so I can directly fight cancer without having to take jobs based on pay simply to cover loan payments)!!!

So please... share this with as many people as possible! It would be beyond legendary and epic if we, as people, working together, could really make a difference with the extra change we have laying about.  And think about it for a moment... wouldn't it be awesome to say you were part of the largest crowd sourcing campaign that had the largest number of people donate the smallest increments of funds??  Honestly... that's worth it in and of itself!!

If nothing else, this will be a cool experience to have been a part of that I can talk about and perhaps improve upon if I plan to crowd source other causes.

**DISCLAIMER**

Anything you send in terms of funds is non-refundable once sent.  This is regardless if I make my stretch goal of 100,000 or not.  Tier goal boons will only be satisfied if I reach 100,000 in funding - contributions will be made regardless if stretch goal is met or not.  I have to put this hear because of the legal garbage we are all subjected to these days.  

Thanks again, and remember that it only takes an idea and a little will to make great change against all odds!

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Chelsea, and I'm a transgender 21 year old college student. I'm trying to raise enough money to be able to afford gender confirmation surgery. Being able to have this surgery would be an absolute dream come true for me. I can honestly say if I was given one wish for absolutely anything, it would be to be able to have this surgery. I'm currently paying for college with student loans and scholarships, and I make under or around $100 a week. In the past year I've been in the emergency room for suicide prevention, struggled with cutting myself, and spent countless evenings crying in friends' arms out of depression and frustration because of how rough transitioning can be and how impossible-to-obtain surgery seems on top of struggling daily with . I want to continue my studies in college and pursue an MBA after I finish my Bachelors degree in economics, but I feel really pressured to join the workforce early in order to feel like I can even begin to try to make an attempt at saving for this.

What We Need

  • The $13,000 goal goes toward the cost of my surgery and travel expenses.
  • If we don't reach the goal, the money will still all go toward paying for the cost of surgery. Regardless, any donations at all are appreciated and I can't thank you enough for your contribution.
  • Any money raised past the goal will be donated to the Jim Collins Foundation. The Jim Collins Foundation is a non-profit organization that provides surgery grants to trans people in need. Every year they're able to help the people in the trans community that need it the most by aiding those who would otherwise never be able to afford necessary transition-related care. Their website can be found here: jimcollinsfoundation.org

 What You Get

  • We have a ton of perk options listed on the side of the page! On top of the available options, feel free to request multiples of any perk or to "create your own package" with your donation! Please, get in contact with me or send me an email and we can discuss the specifics! :) 
  • We'll begin making and shipping out donation perks as soon as each donation comes in to show appreciation for your donation! 

The Impact

I don't really know how to describe how much of an impact this surgery would have on me other than it would be an absolute dream come true. 

There are so many little things that are difficult for a trans woman to deal with. I would be able to wear a swimsuit in public without having to wear shorts. I would be able to date people, and talk to people I'm attracted to, without worrying about them no longer being interested, or even worse becoming violent, when they learn what my body is like. I would be able to have sex with my partner without having to stop from breaking down in tears.

Having this surgery would allow me to be able to focus on helping other people. I want to do personal finance work when I finish my degree. I want to help people be able to afford their dreams. Saving up for and affording surgery gets in the way of this for me though. I want to start my own credit union to help people in need, but the cost of surgery is in the way of me being able to save up to start a business. 

On top of financial work, I plan on remaining very active in the trans community (and the lgbtq community as a whole) for the rest of my life. I want to be someone people can come to for help, and to be there for people who need help the most. I've worked with friends who have been kicked out of their house for being trans, people whose entire families have ostracized them, people who have lost everything they own, people who live in poverty and homelessness, and people who have attempted to kill themselves because of how stressful the struggle of being trans is sometimes. I want so badly to be able to "not have to worry about myself" so I can devote as much energy as I possibly can to helping everyone around me.

Risks & Challenges

$13,000 feels like a lot of money, especially to someone who works minimum wage part-time like me. My yearly salary amounts to roughly $4,500. I'm very much aware of how much money it will take to reach my goal, but I can also say that from the bottom of my heart, not a cent of it will go unappreciated.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing this page, or my youtube videos would mean the world. Not even just for the purposes of this campaign - any help at all raising awareness about the trans community and the issues we face helps! Indiegogo also has tools to share the campaign right here on this page!

I'll be posting a video update on the campaign every Wednesday and Saturday where I'll be talking about how the campaign itself is going or about issues related to it. They'll be on here as well as on my youtube channel!
