story_txt:
At Laguna Fin Co. we created a swimming fin that leaves your feet as happy as you are once you leave the water. Growing up we spent most of our time at beaches and in pools around Laguna Beach. We were tired of uncomfortable fins that caused blisters and cramps. Even finding the right fin size was a major problem. So we designed a built-in neoprene foot pocket with adjustable straps, meant to fit your foot perfectly. Now we're happy to introduce the most comfortable fin on the planet! Say goodbye to uncomfortable fins and start swimming with Laguna Fin Co.Olympian tested: Caroline Burckle 2008 USA Bronze Medalist  
Hand-sewn neoprene foot pocket for maximum comfort 
Reinforced toe pocket with water resistant military grade fabric (1000 Denier Cordura with urethane backing) 
Ultra responsive blade made from a polymer/rubber blend
Adjustable heel strap for perfect sizing
Hidden adjustable arch strap built to perfectly fit foot width
Extremely light-weight & travel friendly
Every pair comes with a mesh bag for quick dry
Net Weight of 1.4 lbs
Designed for competitive training
Uses: Swim stroke training, recreational, open water swimming, triathlon training, body surfing, bodyboarding, and snorkeling
All levels of swimmers

Small/Medium fits U.S. shoe sizes (Men's: 4 - 8.5+, Women's: 5 - 9+)

Large fits U.S. shoe sizes (Men's: 9.5 - 10.5+, Women's: 8.5 - 11+)

XL fits U.S. shoe sizes (Men's: 10.5 - 17+, Women's: 11.5+)
  
Hand-sewn neoprene foot pocket for maximum comfort 
Reinforced toe pocket with water resistant military grade fabric (1000 Denier Cordura with urethane backing) 
Ultra responsive blade made from a polymer/rubber blend
Adjustable heel strap for perfect sizing
Hidden adjustable arch strap built to perfectly fit foot width
Extremely light-weight & travel friendly
Every pair comes with a mesh bag for quick dry
Fits U.S. child shoe sizes (Y6-6)* (see diagram below)
Net Weight of < 1 lb.
Designed for children
Uses: Learning to swim, swim stroke training, recreational, beach activities, junior lifeguards, and snorkeling
All levels of swimmers
  Never lose a pair of fins on the pool deck or at the beach again!We will permanently add your name, nickname, or any lettering of your choice to the heel strap of your brand new Laguna Fins. It's easy, just choose a perk with personalized fins and we'll email you and ask you to let us know what you want added and we'll do the rest! COMFORT Laguna Fins have a built-in neoprene foot pocket that maximizes comfort by molding perfectly to your feet, leaving them as happy as you are after a workout. Our neoprene foot pocket allows for 100% kicking power. There are over 7,000 nerve endings in each foot, keep them happy so you can kick with all your power. Laguna Fin Co. is guaranteed the most comfortable fin on the planet or your money back. Say goodbye to cuts, cramps, and blisters caused by stiff rubber fins, start swimming with Laguna Fin Co. SIZING Laguna Fins are built with 2 adjustable straps meant to fit your foot perfectly. The adjustable heel strap fits perfectly to the length of each foot. This allows you to share fins easily, accommodate different sized feet and growth spurts. Just tighten to your liking and get swimming. The hidden arch strap adjusts to the width and arch of your foot, eliminating problems for narrow and wide feet.  ALL 4 COMPETITIVE STROKES Now swimmers can train for all 4 competitive strokes; butterfly, backstroke, breaststroke, and freestyle! Most fins don't allow swimmers to turn their feet our properly to swim breaststroke. Laguna Fins were designed to allow breaststrokers and medley swimmers to train with fins. Don't believe us? Watch the video & hear it from the pros below!

"Game Changing Fin" with Olympian Kaitlin Sandeno from Laguna Fin Co on Vimeo.

story:
About

 

We are an award-winning London based industrial design agency that brought you the Angle Razor in 2018. After raising £60,000 on Kickstarter the razor went on to win a D&AD pencil and was shortlisted for Wallpaper* Magazine's grooming product of the year.

Now we want to complete the grooming experience with the beautiful Brush and Bowl.

 

Most men will have experienced skin irritation from shaving at some point. It’s easy to rush a shave and skip out on the preparation, but this pre-shave step is the key to getting the best result from your shave.

 

The Brush

Using a brush with plenty of warm water to apply your foam lather helps to soften the hair and raise it off the face. This helps you achieve a closer shave, reduce the risk of in-grown hairs and exfoliates your skin at the same time.

 

The Bowl

Having a high-sided bowl allows you to get a great thickness to your lather. This thickness lubricates the skin allowing the blade to glide over it without causing damage to the uppermost layer. Our bowl also acts as a cradle for the brush allowing it to drip dry after you've finished your shave.

While we advocate shaving with our Angle Razor, if you haven't got around to buying one yet and have a cartridge razor, you can still elevate your grooming regime with our Brush and Bowl - you'll still be doing both your facial hair and skin a huge favour... but while we're here, you can now get both the award winning Angle razor and the new Brush & Bowl together in a special Kickstarter package, saving yourself 35% off the full retail price.

 

1. Cruelty free. We tested lots of brush knots until we found a synthetic option that performed like the traditional badger hair but is cruelty-free. Even better, our synthetic brush doesn't require softening in hot water like a traditional badger hair brush; it’s super soft from the first use.

 

2. Built to last. The brush handle and bowl are both made from anodised aluminium making them resistant to soapy water and wet bathroom environments and tough enough to last a lifetime.

 

3. More hygienic. The arm of the bowl acts as a cradle for the brush allowing it to dry properly after each use therefore reducing the build up of bacteria.

 

4. Ergonomic design. Not only does the brush balance perfectly on the bowl, the weight and shape of both tools have been considered for how they fit in the hand, with the high sides to the bowl giving you the ability to whip up a foam lather without it spilling over the sides.

 
 

5. Better for the environment. Using a brush and bowl allows you to use more affordable and more sustainable bar soaps and achieve the same results as expensive foams.

 

Whilst canned shaving foam produces a great foam, we all know how bad aerosol cans are for the environment. On average bar shaving soap lasts for over seven times as long as the cans and are free from all those nasty chemicals.

Whilst it's obviously a little more work to work up the lather yourself rather than squirt it straight from a can, we've designed our hand held Bowl to make this as least amount of effort as possible. Taking the time to work the lather into your skin with our Brush will exfoliate it, soften the hair and reduce the chance of shaving irritation.

Order your Brush and Bowl at our Kickstarter rate and make a conscious effort to reduce waste and look good doing it.

 

The Angle Razor is a machined aluminium straight razor that takes almost any disposable razor blade. It's been designed to be easy to control and to clean, to feel perfectly balanced in the hand and to give an incredibly precise shave using a single blade.

After being 383% funded on Kickstarter last year, we've been amazed by how well our Angle Razor has been received since launched. Now stocked in stores across the globe, we are giving you an exclusive opportunity to purchase one at a reduced price if you pledge for a Brush and Bowl today.

 

The Angle Razor has been improved since the initial launch in 2018 based on customer feedback. A tighter shaving angle with increased blade visibility gives an even closer shave and we’ve improved the way the magnet holds the blade whilst you are loading it.

 

We are launching this updated version simultaneously with the launch of the Brush and Bowl so this is your opportunity to get your hands on the new and improved Angle Razor before anyone else.

After the success of the Angle Razor we knew that the Brush and Bowl had a lot to live up to. Starting out as a stand alone brush, we spent months finding the perfect size and weight balance and debating between a badger or synthetic brush knot.

During on-going testing of the brush, we realised that the brush needed a stand to ensure it dried properly after use and that a shaving bowl would really complete the experience. At Morrama we find beauty in simplicity and so we created a shaving bowl that both cradles and displays the brush.

If you'd like to support the Angle by Morrama campaign in style then why not grab yourself a flash sheet of design-inspired temporary tattoos, illustrated by hand and printed on skin-safe, non-toxic transfer paper.

Shout us out on Twitter and and follow us for more awesome updates.

Sharing is caring! Spread the word and help bring the Brush and Bowl to market.

Add some minimal product design to your latest boards!

For full press release, photos and more follow this link!

 

Risks and challenges

Making a physical product is a difficult task and there can be many challenges to bring it to market successfully from design and manufacturing to shipping and support.

However we are an experienced design & engineering team who have worked on taking multiple products to market including our own Kickstarter funded Angle Razor last year.

Getting products to market is what we do every day and we'll do everything within our power to get the Brush and Bowl in your hands as quickly as possible and keep you up to date with the whole process.

As a backer you're incredibly special to us and we look forward to keeping you updated on our progress as we bring the Brush and Bowl to you!

story:
Only 1/3 kids are getting the recommended daily amount of physical activity and only 5% of adults. Teens are spending more than 7.5 hours a day in front of a screen rather than participating in some form of physical activity. Adults have higher risk of stroke, heart failure, stress, depression, and cancer than if they got only 30 minutes of physical activity everyday.

Being active doesn't mean getting up at 6am to go for a run. It can be as simple as walking your dog, taking the stairs, or parking farther away! 

Hi, this is Micheal, one of the co-founders of Run for Stuff. 

So one year ago I was going for a run with my girlfriend and she said to me, 
"Wouldn't it be sweet if we ran to booster juice and they gave us a free juice for running?".
Right at that moment I realized the potential of a simple reward and how it could encourage physical activity. 

As soon as I got home I purchased the domain name runforstuff.com for $14.99 

Since that day we got to work. Today we have a team of 5, and we all attend Macewan University in Edmonton, AB. Our office headquarters is located in Startup Edmonton, right across the street from Rogers Place. 

So what is Run for Stuff? 

We created Run for Stuff to be a reward platform that encourages people to be active by giving awesome exclusive discounts on fitness apparel products. Our mission is to encourage 1 million people to become more physically active by 2019, and save people over 50 million dollars. We provide a way for fitness companies to give back to their customers in a unique way that further motivates and encourages people to live a healthy and active lifestyle. Imagine, you walk everyday, why not get rewarded for it? 

Run for Stuff is more than a fitness app, it is FUN!

With Run for Stuff the more you are active through walking or running, the more you get. Browse products that are offered on sweet rewards, and redeem those products with the points you earned. 

Furthermore, if you see a product from a company that you love, but it is not offered on reward, you can select to get notified when it is, so that you can always keep yourself motivated just in case! 

Run for Stuff truly makes running, and shopping, into a game! 

What We Need 

To be frank, we need money to expand our team and create more events that can get people active. 

Our goals for the summer is to promote physical activity through putting on more and more events that lets people be active in fun ways. Things like capture the flag, dodgeball, tag, baseball, soccer, etc. Furthermore, we want to help underprivileged kids get access to organized sports, and supply them with the equipment needed. We strongly believe in helping our community and supporting those who need the help. However, we are funding ourselves on very limited resources. 

We currently have a team of 5 working on Run for Stuff.  Everyone on the team is working for sweat equity, and putting everything we have into this, but to be more sustainable and earn the trust of companies that want to back us we need to have full time employees. As well, the funding would be used for marketing expenses. As a socially responsible company we want to back anything to do with health and physical activity such as: 

  • Sponsoring running events
  • Creating/Sponsoring initiates to get kids and adults active
  • Donating to charities such as Stollery Children Hospital, Stand up to Cancer, Heart and Stroke Foundation, etc. 

The money you provide will be going towards a cause to help people live healthier lives

The way Run for Stuff works

  1. Download the app
  2. Walk or Run
  3. Get Points
  4. Redeem

The app runs in the background and tracks how many steps you take a day. We will also be linking to trackers such as fitbit, apple watch, garmin, ect. 

Risks & Challenges

We have a very high value proposition to companies, but in order to get them on board we need you first! Just by going to www.runforstuff.com and signing up for our email list (don't worry we will not spam you) you can help us get the big brands by showing them that people actually care about us. 

 

Where we are at

January-May 

- Develop business portal that allows companies to upload inventory

May - August

- Develop IOS and Android application 

May-July

- Reach out to companies such as Adidas, Mizuno, Brooks, Reebok, Underarmour, Nike, Taylormade, and many more. 

August-September 

Launch IOS and Android application 

 

The Perks: 

Our perks were created to give backers the opportunity to not only support our vision, but to also provide an opportunity for them to also give back in a socially responsible way. For each perk, we will be donating $5 to Stand Up to Cancer.  

We want to work for our money! We at Run for Stuff are all willing to run 1 km for every $25 we get. We are capping this at 100 km, otherwise it might take all summer to do this haha. 

We also will be providing backers the option of various Hydro Flasks, misting water bottles that give you that little spray when you need that little cool down and Phone arm bands for Apple iPhone 5 5S SE 6 6S + Phone Case for when you are running and need to carry your phone. 

 

AND to top it all, certain backers will be featured in a chalk mural that we are getting designed by a local artist. How cool would it be to see your name in something that changed the world! 

Our Team

Micheal: Founder and Hustler

John: Founder and Hacker

Max: Marketing Guru and Hipster 

Christian: Designer and Co-Hacker 

Jonah: App genius and Hacker 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Talk about us! Tell your friends! Follow us on Instagram! 

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Only 1/3 kids are getting the recommended daily amount of physical activity and only 5% of adults. Teens are spending more than 7.5 hours a day in front of a screen rather than participating in some form of physical activity. Adults have higher risk of stroke, heart failure, stress, depression, and cancer than if they got only 30 minutes of physical activity everyday.
Being active doesn't mean getting up at 6am to go for a run. It can be as simple as walking your dog, taking the stairs, or parking farther away! 
Hi, this is Micheal, one of the co-founders of Run for Stuff. 
So one year ago I was going for a run with my girlfriend and she said to me, "Wouldn't it be sweet if we ran to booster juice and they gave us a free juice for running?".Right at that moment I realized the potential of a simple reward and how it could encourage physical activity. 
As soon as I got home I purchased the domain name runforstuff.com for $14.99 
Since that day we got to work. Today we have a team of 5, and we all attend Macewan University in Edmonton, AB. Our office headquarters is located in Startup Edmonton, right across the street from Rogers Place. 
So what is Run for Stuff? 
We created Run for Stuff to be a reward platform that encourages people to be active by giving awesome exclusive discounts on fitness apparel products. Our mission is to encourage 1 million people to become more physically active by 2019, and save people over 50 million dollars. We provide a way for fitness companies to give back to their customers in a unique way that further motivates and encourages people to live a healthy and active lifestyle. Imagine, you walk everyday, why not get rewarded for it? 
Run for Stuff is more than a fitness app, it is FUN!
With Run for Stuff the more you are active through walking or running, the more you get. Browse products that are offered on sweet rewards, and redeem those products with the points you earned. 
Furthermore, if you see a product from a company that you love, but it is not offered on reward, you can select to get notified when it is, so that you can always keep yourself motivated just in case!

Get Points

Just by going to www.runforstuff.com and signing up for our email list (don't worry we will not spam you) you can help us get the big brands by showing them that people actually care about us. 
 
Where we are atJanuary-May - Develop business portal that allows companies to upload inventoryMay - August- Develop IOS and Android application May-July- Reach out to companies such as Adidas, Mizuno, Brooks, Reebok, Underarmour, Nike, Taylormade, and many more. August-September Launch IOS and Android application 
 
The Perks: 
Our perks were created to give backers the opportunity to not only support our vision, but to also provide an opportunity for them to also give back in a socially responsible way. For each perk, we will be donating $5 to Stand Up to Cancer.

We also will be providing backers the option of various Hydro Flasks, misting water bottles that give you that little spray when you need that little cool down and Phone arm bands for Apple iPhone 5 5S SE 6 6S + Phone Case for when you are running and need to carry your phone. 
 



AND to top it all, certain backers will be featured in a chalk mural that we are getting designed by a local artist. How cool would it be to see your name in something that changed the world! 
Our Team
Micheal: Founder and Hustler

John: Founder and Hacker

Max: Marketing Guru and Hipster 

Christian: Designer and Co-Hacker

story:
DuoTrac is a Multi-Point, Motion Sensor and Free Mobile App that tracks and improves swing, weight shift and transition performance. Our Quad Sensors Quadruples the accuracy of single sensors and give weight shift and power transition data to complete a 4D snapshot of your swing. 

Once paired with your Smartphone, the sensors automatically connect every time you practice.  The App is so easy-to-use and makes training FUN and highly effective so that you don't keep practicing the wrong swing. Perfect Practice makes Perfect.


If you track only your swing without any consideration of weight shift, you are getting half the picture.  With a full picture - DuoTrac eliminates the guesswork to deliver effective coaching feedback for every swing. Get complete with 4D.  

Perfect practice makes perfect. DuoTrac doesn’t slap a Band-Aid on a player’s bad swing habits, it helps cure it. It’ll break the vicious cycle of practicing the wrong habits by supplying metrics at each key position of the swing to keep you square, as well as coaching tips to correct your position. Doing so will help create awareness around swing consistency and bring attention to errors in a swing before practiced and conditioned with the wrong techniques. With DuoTrac, a golfer can immediately identify weak points in advance, subsequently reducing wasteful training.

Jason Koo, founder of Coach Labs, Inc., is a serial entrepreneur and inventor of the KooClip sunglass visor clip and co-inventor of the SnapCap two-piece golf ferrules. He has 20 years’ experience as an inventor and product developer that spans retail, promotional products, electronics, sports and technology. He has created global brands through mass-market with Sunglass Hut, Walmart, Target, CVS, and Best Buy to name a few. As a “scratch” golfer, Jason Koo blended his passions for golf and innovation and created DuoTrac.

Curt Menefee is a partner for DuoTrac. As a veteran studio and game broadcaster, Curt Menefee quarterbacks FOX NFL SUNDAY. Menefee teams with co-host Terry Bradshaw and studio analysts Howie Long, Jimmy Johnson and Michael Strahan during the NFL season. In 2015, Menefee hosted the network’s inaugural U.S. Open Golf Championship coverage from Chambers Bay. This year, Menefee will be hosting the 2016 U.S. Open Oakmont, Pennsylvania.

Risks and challenges

Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan. Sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. Should we miss projections, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible.

Supply Chain Risk

We’ve built a very capable team. However, delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Terms and Conditions

Backers with EU shipping addresses who elect to pre-pay their duties and taxes will have their rewards fulfilled by our forwarding agent.

Our Warranty

Thank you for your interest in DuoTrac.

This Limited Warranty applies to physical goods, and only for physical goods purchased from Coach Labs, Inc.

What does this limited warranty cover?

This Limited Warranty covers any defects in material or workmanship under normal use during the Warranty Period.

During the Warranty Period, Coach Labs Inc. will repair or replace, at no charge, products or parts of a product that proves defective because of improper material or workmanship, under use and maintenance.

What will we do to correct problems?

Coach Labs Inc. will either repair the product at no charge, using new or refurbished replacement parts.

How long does the coverage last?

The Warranty Period for Physical Goods purchased from Coach Labs Inc. is 1 year from the date of purchase.

A replacement Physical Good or part assumes the remaining warranty of the original Physical Good or 1 year from the date of replacement or repair, whichever is longer.

What does this limited warranty not cover?

This Limited Warranty does not cover any problem that is caused by:

• Malfunctions or damage not resulting from defects in material or workmanship. 
• Improper use and damage from being cracked, dropped or through water damage.

What do you have to do?

To obtain warranty service, you must first contact us to determine the problem and the most appropriate solution for you.

story:
What we put on our skin is just as important as what we put in our bodies.  Although the skin is the body's largest organ, many of us take it for granted.
        As part of Orijin's mandate to promote self-care and mindfulness, we’ve developed the 100% all-natural and biodegradable Orijin Sponge. Made from Japanese Konjac Plant Root and infused with anti-microbial bamboo charcoal, the Orijin Sponge will provide your skin with the TLC it deserves while also heightening your showering experience. 

 

 Most bathing sponges you’ll find in-store or online today are made with the use of chemicals, synthetic oils, plastic and artificial coloring. These “glorified plastic bags” as we like to call them, are a breeding ground for dank smells and bacterial growth, do absolutely nothing for our skin and take over 150 years to decompose!

Made completely from 100% all natural Konjac plant root, the Orijin sponge's powerful fibers are naturally alkaline and hydrating. In addition, the Orijin Sponge exfoliates even the most sensitive skin without irritation.

Infused with Bamboo Charcoal, the Orijin Sponge is anti-microbial allowing the konjac fibers to absorb debris and impurities without allowing bacteria to grow or linger.

The Orijin Sponge is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in hand while providing great coverage for an easy and thorough full body scrub down.

 

Said to have been discovered by Japanese farmers who used konjac to wash their babies' skin because of the plants gentle and natural features,  Konjac is native to Japan and has been used since the 6th century. 

 When Dry, the Orijin Sponge is 3x smaller dimensionally and more than 11.5x lighter in weight. When dry the Orijin Sponge weighs only 17grams and when fully hydrated it increases to the perfect weight of 198g.

 Feel free to use the Orijin Sponge all over your body, especially on the chest, back & face.  These areas are easily acne-prone and need an extra deep clean. The Orijin Sponge is gentle enough to be used on sensitive areas, like around your eyes, while tough and sturdy enough for a full body scrub down. 

 The surface of the Orijin Sponge was designed to help channel water away from the surface for a better lathering experience and for more efficient drying time when the Orijin Sponge is not in use.   

Just last year more than 4,000 awesome supporters brought The Thinking Egg (our previous campaign) to life, making it the most successful mindfulness tool to ever launch on a crowd funding platform. The feedback after having shipped on time to all of our supporters was awesome. We'll be continuing that tradition come fulfillment time for your Orijin Sponge!

 
       At Orijin, we intentionally design products that harmoniously intertwine form and function.
     Our hope is that we can provide you with products and ideas to help live a more present, aware and conscious life.

Thank you for taking a look at our campaign. If you have any questions, please reach out, we'd be happy to help!

story:
Each year, the Nation's Capital Area USBC Association conducts various fundraising campaigns to support the Bowler to Veterans Link charity.  This year, our pro shop is attempting to raise $2,000 to help them send 4 portable bowling lanes to active duty troops.

Bowling Salutes America’s Troops,”was introduced in 2005 by  BVL.  It has now delivered more than 550 kits to troops deployed on active duty in Iraq, Afghanistan, Kuwait, Korea and a host of other countries. The program has been tremendously successful  providing soldiers, sailors and airmen an opportunity to take a break from the stresses of their jobs and enjoy the fun and camaraderie of the game of bowling. The kit consists of a 26 foot long red, white and blue carpet bowling lane, a 5 lb. rubberized bowling ball and lightweight plastic bowling pins. The lane, ball and pins, packaged in a nylon carrying bag, can be set up in a few minutes time, whenever a break in the schedule permits.

This is but one of the programs funded by BVL.  You can read more about this organization and what you can do to help at www.BowlforVeterans.org

story:
SHORT SUMMARY:

I love my Mom, Laurie Squires Bovee. She is an award-winning rose gardener, with many medals and trophies to vouch for her mastery. Unfortunately…life has been extremely hard on my Mom. She needed hip replacement surgery a few years ago, which almost killed her when the chromium and cobalt hip implant they put in her began shaving heavy metal into her bloodstream. The device was later recalled by the manufacturer, which led her back into the operating room for a second hip replacement surgery, but the damage had already been done. She has just been diagnosed with breast cancer. Those of us who love her will do what we can to inspire and empower her recovery. This is the motivation behind project Blossoms and Blessings. Cultivating beautiful rose gardens brings my Mom joy and keeps her active and outside. It connects her with the vital energy of Nature. We all die one day, but I want more than anything to help my Mom live every moment she has left to the fullest. Every act of compassion is significant, so let's start with something small - a rose garden for The Rose Lady. Flowers grown in this garden will be donated to cancer patients in local hospitals.


WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET:

We need loving prayers backed by actions and energized by faith. We need the power of God flowing through the lives of people. We need seeds of compassion sown in order to cultivate them into blossoms and blessings. You get to sow seeds of compassion, which are eternal. You will live forever in our hearts. 25 of you have the opportunity to dedicate a rose to a loved one. You also get beautiful breast-cancer awareness accessories which are extremely useful in certain circumstances. Finally, you get the opportunity to meet and spend a little time with one of the coolest people in human history, the Rose Lady, Laurie Squires Bovee.




IMPACT:

By contributing to Blossoms and Blessings you are not only helping a great woman in her hour of greatest need; you are also contributing to raising awareness of the health issues which have brought her and our family so much pain. Cancer is sweeping through our civilization like a plague. If there is one thing I know about my Mom it is she can find joy and strength under any circumstance. The joy of the Lord is her strength, and she can do all things in Christ which strengthens her. We are striving together to educate and empower ourselves against this plague, and we will be sharing the fruits of this labor with you. We will also be sharing the roses grown in this garden with cancer patients in local hospitals. We are fighters. Stand with us!


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN CONTRIBUTE:

Spread the word! The internet and websites like www.indiegogo.com make it possible to reach people from all over the world. With smartphones this can be done virtually anywhere, anytime. Local newspapers and stations as well as magazines and e-zines would love to hear of this project, and could greatly help us to spread the word. Any effort given to this would be extremely valuable and appreciated. This project is not the end. Link up with us via the blog www.herocompass.blogspot.com, on facebook, twitter, or in person if you can. We are each others greatest resources. Live out loud!

story:
Short Summary

     Global Brigades is the world’s largest student-led global health and sustainable development organization. Since 2004, Global Brigades has mobilized thousands of university students and professionals through nine skill-based programs that work in partnership with community members to improve quality of life in under resourced regions while respecting local culture. I am a member of the San Jose state chapter of Global Medical Brigades.

 

What We Need & What You Get

     As you can imagine the costs associated with this project are high. Each member of our chapter has been tasked to raise $3,000 (Our upcoming trip in January has 32 volunteers) . This money will help to fund medicine and necessary equipment as well as offset the cost for transportation and room and bored for the associated medical professionals and student volunteers.

$1 - Thank you every donation counts!

$10 - You will receive a letter and picture from a Global Medical Brigades volunteer after our upcoming trip showing exactly how your donation was used. Domestic shipping is free!

$20 - You will receive all the above perks and a sterling silver .925 rope style chain necklace. Domestic shipping is free!

$100 - You will receive all the above perks and a drawing from either a volunteer or a child whom your donation helps showing what we see in Ghana!

$500 - You will receive all the above perks and a phone call where you can talk to a volunteer and see for yourself exactly how much of an impact your contribution had!

$1,000 - You will receive all the above perks and lunch with a volunteer (in San Jose, CA) where you can ask questions and see for yourself exactly  how much of an impact your contribution had!

$5,000 - You will receive all the above perks and a pair of boxing gloves autographed by Muhammad Ali!

 

The Impact

     Medical Brigades strives to improve access to healthcare for rural community members by offering complete comprehensive consultation services through our brigades' medical clinics. To increase healthcare access, our program organizes brigades in a mobile-clinic type fashion with the help of community leaders and volunteers. Medical Brigades works in many communities that eventually will or have started to become Holistic Communities, complete with projects from all of our other programs. We visit each community on average, every 4-6 months. During the time leading up to each brigade, the in-country team conducts a community visit as well. This visit consists of a meeting with community leaders and volunteers, in order to both prepare them for the upcoming brigade and simultaneously outline their contribution to the brigade. Community contributions range from gathering volunteers to assist with the brigade, identifying and preparing clean and private workspaces for doctors, raising awareness about the upcoming brigade, etc. 

     Depending on volunteer numbers, weather and brigade seasons, the Medical team implements medical care via three-day brigades in each community at least twice per year. The brigade offers comprehensive, on-site care, including triage, general consultation, gynecology, dental care, an educational health presentation for children and adults, and a pharmacy. Each patient will leave the brigade with a complete consultation, illness prevention education, and appropriate medicine, for both current problems presented during consultation and for prevention of common health problems in the community. Brigade implementation involves community participation, student work, expertise of medical professionals, medical supplies and medication.

     For health conditions that require care beyond that which can be offered during the brigade, Medical Brigades has a Referral Program through which patients receive referrals to specialists, emergency transportation, and/or continued assistance from student groups as needed. Outside of normal brigades, Medical Brigades works with the Community Health Workers (CHW) Program to train community-selected leaders in how to provide basic medical care and monitor chronic conditions. The Community Health Workers play a vital role in the Global Brigades sustainability model. Since many of the illnesses seen at our mobile clinics are preventable (intestinal parasites, dehydration, etc.) communities benefit greatly from trained CHWs working to educate residents on preventative action, and notify patients if and when their conditions require medical attention. Additionally, CHWs can continue to provide basic medical care and education to their communities during the months between brigades.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate today that does not mean that you can't help! Tell your family, friends and everyone you know about this

Since 2004, Global Brigades has mobilized thousands of university students and professionals through nine skill-based programs that work in partnership with community members to improve quality of life in under resourced regions while respecting local culture. I am a member of the San Jose state chapter of Global Medical Brigades. What We Need & What You Get     As you can imagine the costs associated with this project are high. Each member of our chapter has been tasked to raise $3,000 (Our upcoming trip in January has 32 volunteers) . This money will help to fund medicine and necessary equipment as well as offset the cost for transportation and room and bored for the associated medical professionals and student volunteers.$1 - Thank you every donation counts!$10 - You will receive a letter and picture from a Global Medical Brigades volunteer after our upcoming trip showing exactly how your donation was used. story:
Ann’s Story –

My mom is probably the toughest individual I’ve ever met in my life.  She’s never backed down from anything she’s ever faced, including her previous battle with Breast Cancer (which she beat).  Unfortunately cancer has reared its ugly head again, this time in her lung.  

To see such a tough woman have to fight so hard is really tough.  Albeit tough it’s also very inspiring, she continues to be the rock in all of her family and friends lives.   Always cracking jokes and making everyone around her happy.    Although she remains positive and continues to fight, cancer is taking a toll.  Cancer doesn’t limit itself to a physical and mental toll it also places a carries a major financial one as well.  

How you can help!  

My mom is an amazing individual…. Ask anyone that knows her she’s right up at the top of everyone’s list.  And more than likely she’s probably gone out of her way to make your day on multiple occasions.  Well this time she needs people to help her out a little (She’d never ask on her own though, just because that’s how she is)!  Mom’s too weak to work but continues to stress about the financial burden being placed on my dad (Once again always caring about others).  I don’t want this burden to hinder her ability to fight cancer… nor do I want her to have to miss out on the opportunity for treatments etc.

Insert Operation Crush Cancer Demolition Derby Car!  We are hoping to raise funds as well as awareness and support.  I’m pretty sure you know someone currently battling cancer, has won and or lost the battle with cancer.  We want their names to go on the Demolition Derby car.   For a small donation we’ll pencil (actually sharpie) their name on the car and let their strength help my mom battle cancer!   We’re also adding a section of the car titled Corporations that support OperationCRUSH Cancer…. If you’re company would like to sponsor we’ll get them added on!

Some other ways you can help!  

Not everyone is in a position to donate on a monetary level, but you can definitely spread the word!  My mom recently received a quilt donated to the radiation facility from an unnamed individual.  My mom is in love with the quilt and it truly put a Texas sized smile on her face.  I would challenge you to find a way in your local community to lend a hand… knit a blanket, or any other way to support those battling this beast they call Cancer!

story:
MEET FASCIAWEAR

 

World's first sportswear that changes the way you move, literally!

Fasciawear enforces the natural pretension and compression of the fascia network in your body. Fasciae play a major role in your body when it comes to movement, posture and performance. Wearing Fasciawear during exercise:

✅ Increases body awareness
✅ Improves posture
✅ Helps getting optimal knee, ankle & hip alignment when running
✅ Get more precision and control to your movement.
✅ Improves your ability to transmit power to the legs and arms

As a result you will

✅ Run faster and more efficiently
✅ Experience less muscle and joint aches
✅ Recover faster from exercise

Fasciawear is not your standard, bulk running outfit. It is a high quality training outfit that has actual functional effects on your body. Besides, it looks cool too :)

 

WHAT OUR USERS SAY ABOUT FASCIAWEAR

 

 

 

FASCIAWEAR EXPLAINED IN 1 MINUTE

 

 

THE STORY BEHIND

From the forest trails of Oulu, Finland we bring you Fasciawear, the most innovative sportswear you have ever worn. Fasciawear is designed by the runners for the runners, it is a innovation by Marika Heiskanen. Marika, a keen runner herself, Master in Health Science & physiotherapist specializes in ergonomics and treating problems of the musculoskeletal system.

Understanding what bad posture and non-optimal movement patterns can cause, Marika came up with the idea of a training outfit that is easy to use without professional help, looks great and feels super comfortable and most importantly, helps the wearer to maintain good posture and optimal movement patterns during exercise to enjoy training, avoid injuries and improve their level of performance. 

The idea of Fasciawear was born. Fasciawear is an elastic and comfortable exercise outfit. Its resistance bands run along the fascial lines activating muscles, increasing exercise efficiency and strengthening the body’s biotensegrity.

 

WHAT MAKES FASCIAWEAR UNIQUE?

Fasciawear is the only sportswear that, as you wear it, has a full body impact. Regular sports clothing may look good, but do not really affect your performance in anyway. Compression clothing on the other hand do usually have some functional impact as well, but it is limited to the part of the body covered by the clothing. Fasciawear's uniqueness comes from the stimulation it provides to the fascia network in your body. By enforcing how the fasciae work naturally, you will benefit from the full body effect that only Fasciawear will provide.

 

 

THIS IS WHAT YOU GET

Your brand new Fasciawear will be shipped starting March 2019. 

 


HOW FASCIAWEAR WORKS?

Fasciawear activates, supports and guides

The concept behind Fasciawear is based on the suit’s inbuilt resistance bands that run along the fasciae of the body. The resistance bands strengthen the function of fascial lines stimulating the proprioseptors within fasciae and improve the sensation of posture and movement. This in turn helps in muscle activation and keeping good posture and guides towards natural movement. You will learn to move more efficiently and the risk of injury will decrease.

Exercise more efficiently with Fasciawear

The most important benefits of Fasciawear are the increased activation of deep core muscles, increase of motoric control and the support it gives during difficult and straining exercises. All this will increase your performance and help prevent sports injuries. Fasciawear allows the body to give more needed feedback to the brain for improving motoric skills and will help your body to remember most optimal posture and movement.

 

 

THE BENEFITS

  • Learn to move more energy efficiently
  • Reduce your risk of getting sports injuries
  • Speed up your recovery time from exercise
  • Increases workout impact
  • Improves body awareness
  • Improves motion control
  • Guides towards optimal movement
  • Increases motor learning

 

HOW TO USE FASCIAWEAR?

Wear the suit for 1 to 2 hours a day during exercise to achieve the best results. The suit can be used during mobility, agility, coordination, stamina and muscle strengthening exercises.
 

MATERIALS & CARE INSTRUCTIONS

 

 

SIZING CHART

Fasciawear is made of very elastic material and shapes to the user. Please select a correct size using our sizing chart.

 

MEET THE TEAM


 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORD

It would mean word to us if you could help us by telling about Fasciawear to your friends in social media. Small click to you, big hugs from us. 

 

Share on Facebook

Tweet on Twitter

Post to LinkedIn
 

Are you from Media? Download our Press Kit:

story:
Short Summary

The pump track--a modular, all weather, prefabricated riding structure that allows riders to propel about anything with wheels around it using the force of gravity—has been approved by the Corvallis Parks, Natural Area and Recreation Advisory Board.  This type of track would be the first of its kind in Oregon!

The proposed Corvallis pump track is ideal for families and children that love to bike, skate or scooter. With childhood obesity and screen time on the rise, the pump track provides a healthy, outdoor activity for children. We also believe that a pump track is a perfect fit for Corvallis's family friendly community. 

Please join us in providing safe, fun, outdoor activities for our children.  Together, let's encourage our community to "Log Off" and "Ride On!"

What We Need & What You Get

Team Dirt, a local chapter of the International Mountain Biking Association (IMBA), is leading the $25,000 fundraising campaign to pay for the purchase and installation of the track in downtown Corvallis. Team Dirt has raised $10,000 so far and needs $25,000 more to purchase the entry level track.  The tracks are modular by design, so if we exceed our funding goal we can purchase a larger track.

We welcome and appreciate any amount you are able to contribute.  

Risks & Challenges

We are and have been working closely with Corvallis Parks and Recreation Department for several years to get us to this point. Timing of installation is dependent on how quickly funds are raised, the location is finalized and the vendor can ship us the track. With your support, we are confident that this wonderful amenity will come together!

If we do not raise the $25,000 we need to buy the track ,Team Dirt will turn over all funds raised to the Friends of Corvallis dedicated Corvallis Pump Track Fund to keep the dream of improving our city cycling infrastructure alive.

http://www.lovecorvallisparks.org/projects/corv...

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share, share , share the word about this campaign.  
    • In person
    • Over the phone
    • Email and email lists
    • Social media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc.
    • If you can think of 2 people or businesses that could make a big impact write them a personal note or give them a call.

story:
DTRAC is designed to relieve "SITTING PAIN". When we sit on a chair or couch, we naturally hunch and slouch and your hips and back suffer. DTRAC helps relieve tension and stress on your back!

You will feel super relaxed in your low back and hips anytime anywhere. Portable so you can use it at your personal spaces or in Hotel room after long flights & long road trips. You will relax, rest and feel refreshed.

No need for Fancy $100 Yoga Clothes. Put on PJ & any shirts. You are ready to treat your low back now. You can even play games on your smart phones on DTRAC because it uses your body weight to achieve "disc traction," "spinal decompression," and "lumbar support" effortlessly.

If you want to jump to the next chapter, scroll down for exercises & stretches for/on/off DTRAC. We have prepared a set of exercises for advanced users & athletes.

Spinal decompression is a type of traction therapy applied to the spine in an attempt to bring about several theoretical benefits including:

  • Create a negative intra-discal pressure to promote retraction or repositioning of the herniated or bulging disc material. 
  • Create a lower pressure in the disc that will cause an influx of healing nutrients and other substances into the disc.1

SITTING is one of the biggest contributor for your Back Problems.

You do not need to ask your friends or husband/wife to massage your back anymore. Stop the awkward conversion. Just use DTRAC. By decompressing the spines, you can finally relax your spines & discs, and plus all the muscles around them.

JUST REST ON DTRAC.

DTRAC relieves the tensions in your low back so you can wake up refreshed every morning.

  • Before bed, to release stress. 
  • Start your morning with DTRAC. Rest comfortably in effortless perfect posture in your low back. It will get yourself ready for work.

 

You can notice the differences immediately. In both x-ray and c-arm pictures, the increase in intervertebral disc spaces is HUGE. DTRAC creates the negative pressure. Disc will be nourished with moisture and nutrients.

If you are sitting at your desk or driving more than 4 hours a day, your back needs DTRAC to reverse the damages on your discs.

With the daily use of DTRAC, most patients & users will see the differences in weeks. Some users feel the differences immediately and gave us testimonials here.

Just pulling you up and down is not traction. Hanging upside down? Yes, it has a traction effect, but not every one can stay that way for a long time. Plus, ankles and hip joints open up more than low back pain. Therefore, chiropractors started to look for solutions. In 2012, on Journal of Manipulative and Physiological Therapeutics introduced a way of new traction. In short, it states that Disc Traction is most effective when achieved with the natural curvature of the low back (a.k.a. lumbar lordosis at 45 degrees).  GUESS what that is? DTRAC!

Using your own body weight, DTRAC can achieve "spinal decompression" effortlessly. Therefore, safe and natural for the spines!

FIR is the newest addition to DTRAC. With the help of Zirconia, in the lap test, it was recorded to release 91.2% FIR.  

I am Dr. Kang, D.C., a chiropractor, myself with 20+ clinical experiences. I graduated from a chiropractic college here in Los Angeles. These clinical years were very crucial for me as I can now distinguish what works and what does not. (Textbooks are not reliable once you are in the filed; they only become the references or decorations)

My wife had experienced a spinal disc problem during her pregnancy years and have suffered from a weak lower back ever since. I developed a DTRAC prototype for my wife at first. Under my careful supervision, she started to train with it for 5-10 minutes in the evenings. I was not to become fully aware of DTRAC's real power until 3 weeks later when she starts to notice no pain and no sciatica even long days of work on her feet. My wife also was suddenly struck by the realization that she had been on my feet all day long without even noticing the effort. Before DTRAC, she would only last a couple of 2 hours before having to sit down to rest my poorly, aching back! That was all the proof I needed to close my clinic and went ALL-IN with DTRAC. Now as the original developer of DTRAC, I stand by with the quality and effectiveness. 

I finally teamed up with a GOOD team that I can elevate DTRAC to the next level. Without the burdens from the old team, I am very excited to explode its potential. I hope you can be a part of it! JOIN US!

 

 

 The Brand-New DTRAC team purchased all the patents, rights, moulds, manufacturing processes, etc. from the first DTRAC team and improved the product inside out. You can call it ALL NEW DTRAC. The only thing that we kept from the v1 is the concept & color. We are actually re-considering the color. If you have a great suggestion in color, please email us here: hello@DTRAC.ca

Different from the previous team, we have partnered with reputable manufacturer, packaging & fulfillment team ready before the launch.

Now all we need is your support to make it to reality once again. We hope you enjoy DTRAC v2 as much as we do.

DTRAC!Using your own body weight, DTRAC can achieve "spinal decompression" effortlessly. Therefore, safe and natural for the spines!FIR is the newest addition to DTRAC. With the help of Zirconia, in the lap test, it was recorded to release 91.2% FIR.  I am Dr. Kang, D.C., a chiropractor, myself with 20+ clinical experiences. I graduated from a chiropractic college here in Los Angeles. These clinical years were very crucial for me as I can now distinguish what works and what does not. (Textbooks are not reliable once you are in the filed; they only become the references or decorations)My wife had experienced a spinal disc problem during her pregnancy years and have suffered from a weak lower back ever since. I developed a DTRAC prototype for my wife at first. Under my careful supervision, she started to train with it for 5-10 minutes in the evenings. I was not to become fully aware of DTRAC's real power until 3 weeks later when she starts to notice no pain and no sciatica even long days of work on her feet. My wife also was suddenly struck by the realization that she had been on my feet all day long without even noticing the effort. Before DTRAC, she would only last a couple of 2 hours before having to sit down to rest my poorly, aching back! That was all the proof I needed to close my clinic and went ALL-IN with DTRAC. Now as the original developer of DTRAC, I stand by with the quality and effectiveness. I finally teamed up with a GOOD team that I can elevate DTRAC to the next level. Without the burdens from the old team, I am very excited to explode its potential. I hope you can be a part of it! JOIN US!   The Brand-New DTRAC team purchased all the patents, rights, moulds, manufacturing processes, etc. from the first DTRAC team and improved the product inside out. You can call it ALL NEW DTRAC. The only thing that we kept from the v1 is the concept & color. We are actually re-considering the color. If you have a great suggestion in color, please email us here: hello@DTRAC.caDifferent from the previous team, we have partnered with reputable manufacturer, packaging & fulfillment team ready before the launch.Now all we need is your support to make it to reality once again. We hope you enjoy DTRAC v2 as much as we do.

story:
FitAir is designed to make you breathe better and live healthier, wherever you are and whatever you do. FitAir improves your health by freeing your air of viruses, smoke, bacteria, allergens and other harmful microbes. By cleaning within 25 square feet of your personal space at a rate of 3x per hour, this personal shield prevents everyday intake of harmful contaminants and allergens both indoor and outdoor. 

With the one-of-kind wristband solution, the ultralight FitAir could be attached to your tote, baby stroller, car seat etc. It is also an ideal travel companion for shared spaces and polluted areas.




 

The smallest and most lightweight particulate air purifier. At only 5.6 oz, the FitAir is ultra-portable to use and extremely lightweight design to carry daily.


Pocket-fit and easy-to-go




It is applicable anywhere you go, no matter you are in your car/office/bedroom/cafe or other outdoor activities, camping/traveling by plane/train and more...
 

Offer fresh breeze during your brainstorm

Better your hangout time with friends

Spice the air in your car

Protect you form allergens while you go camping/other outdoor activities

A must-have gadget while you travel/share small spaces

Release yourself and your loved ones form travel discomfort
 

FitAir is great for those with allergies or asthma, frequent travelers, shared office spaces, young children or seniors susceptible to viruses, city dwellers where air quality is compromised and climate-controlled bedrooms.
 

 

 


     

    Cleans the air in your personal space to eliminate common allergens (pollen, mold, pet dander, dust mites), smoke, microbes, PM2.5 and pollution.
     It effectively removes microbes down to 0.3 μm.
     

     

    High porous inlets with 290 ports allowing maximum air flow of 130 L/min (average adult breathing capacity is 10-20 L/min).
    Three-level air flow adjustments allow for customized control based on your need.


     

     


     

    FitAir is a smart device that connect via Bluetooth to your phone. The FitAir app keeps you informed of your air quality, temperature, humidity and wind speed level surrounding you.

    For convenience, it also calculates your HEPA filter life as well as remaining battery life so you don’t need to worry about checking either.

     


    · Realtime Air quality display    · Filter Reminder    · Battery Life Indicator


    The filter life depends on the polluted level of the area you live.  FitAir H13 HEPA Filter typically lasts for 1-2 months in a polluted environment and 2-4 months in a less polluted environment.


    Modularized design makes your filter changing easier

     


     

    A full charge offers a maximum 6 hours continuous operation.
    Colored lights indicate remaining battery hours.

     


     


     

    Charge easily by any USB ports to support your daily work routine

     

     

     


     

    Add essential oils and place in office or bedroom to enhance your well being physically and mentally.
     

    Drop your favourite essential oil on the cotton pad and enjoy the fresh air

     



     

    You can easily disassemble FirAir and combine with Wristband in the package for many other situations.

    An easy-to-use strap quickly attaches the device to your arm or backpack.


    Easily protect your young ones by placing in strollers or strapping on baby carriers to form a protective air shield for adult and child.



     


     


     

    Design concept



    Early prototypes design process 
     



     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Silicon Valley Air Expert Inc. is a leading air purifier company founded by a group of technology experts and entrepreneurs from Silicon Valley. We are dedicated to developing innovative air purification solutions based on ionic wind technology. Our Airdog series air purifiers are high-performance and eliminate the waste and expense of disposable filter cartridges. FitAir is a portable and multiform air purifier that is the best choice on the road.

     


     

    FREE SHIPPING ONLY within the continental United States/HK/TW/CHINA.
    Due to the different policies in different area, please offer more patience and cooperation when your local carriers reach out to you. 


     

     

    For further Tech Support / For Order/General Info.

story:
Have you ever wanted to make a real difference in healthcare? Well, here is your chance! We're offering an opportunity, not just to get to a better bedpan, but also for you to help improve the quality of life for all the nurses, caregivers, and patients who deal with bedpans every day.

100% of the funds raised will go towards fulfilling orders and marketing so that we can get the Bedderpan™ into the hands of those who need a better bedpan. And, for anyone who wants to donate Bedderpans directly to care facilities, we're offering the special Bedderpan Benefactor perk to directly improve the quality of life for everyone there.

We also recognize that the Bedderpan is a kind of product that people may need immediately rather than waiting a couple of months. This is why, unlike most other crowdfunding campaigns at launch, any perk with a full-sized Bedderpan will be shipped no later than the next day after receiving the order (unless USPS is closed the next day and as long as supplies last).

 

The Bedderpan is a simple, but better bedpan that improves patient and caregiver quality of life by adding comfort and reducing spillage.

 

 

For any unaware, bedpans are used to collect bodily waste for those physically unable to get out of bed. Because 1 in 7 adults experience a disability that limits their mobility and independence, millions of people must use bedpans every day.

But, current bedpans are far from perfect. They have many issues that frustrate nurses and patients everywhere: they exacerbate discomfort, they spill excessively, and amplify dependency. These are not things that patients and nurses should be worried about.

 

 
 

Nurses and patients alike know all too well the difficulties regarding spillage, discomfort, and dependency, and, in fact, many prefer not using any bedpan altogether.

 

Each time a bedpan spills, it takes an additional 15 minutes to clean up. We estimate that due to bedpan spillage, over 24 million hours are wasted in hospitals across the US – every year. Not to mention the millions more in homes like yours and mine. 

 

Imagine if all this time could be utilized for other important responsibilities or even for nurses and caregivers to take better care of themselves, like actually having the time to eat lunch.

 

As the only product designed using another bedpan as a supplement, the Bedderpan is able to both improve comfort and reduce the chance of spillage. A truly better bedpan.


To address many of the issues of bedpans, the Bedderpan offers a wide seating area, a sturdy frame, and a low profile. These together create a bedpan that is more comfortable, more stable, and easier to position under patients. The front opening addresses the largest concern of all: spillage. By facilitating taking out waste, bedpan removal is a cinch.

 

With a more ergonomic and effective design, the Bedderpan offers numerous benefits over current bedpans: saving time and money, increasing satisfaction for both patients and nurses, and promoting less skin irritation, allowing for less spillage for bacterial growth, and causing less bedsores.

 

The Bedderpan is used very similarly to current bedpans. The main difference is the removal, where the fracture pan can be removed separately to get rid of waste quickly, and effectively.

 

 

 

 

The Bedderpan is made and manufactured in the USA, and offers a high standing strength with a light-weight, recyclable material.

Without a fracture pan, the Bedderpan is sized at 9.8"x11.7"x3.3".

With a fracture pan, the combination is 12.6"x11.7"x3.4" to the handle.

 

The Bedderpan is strong enough to support the full standing weight of an average man without deforming.

 

We recognize that because some people need the Bedderpan now, rather than in a month or two, any full-sized Bedderpan order will be processed no later than the next day after backing our campaign! Fulfilled with free 2-3 day shipping for US locations. Please note that international orders take longer to ship and may come with import tax & duty, depending on your country.

 

 

 

Hello! We are Michael (left) and Jordan (right), the co-founders of Emleorate and inventors of the Bedderpan. When we originally were studying Biomedical Engineering at Georgia Tech and started working in the healthcare industry, we had aspirations of working on projects that would help save millions of lives because we felt that this was the best way to have an impact. Later, after learning about all of the issues with bedpans and hearing unsettling stories from nurses and patients, we quickly realized that having simple improvements in quality of life is just as important. That is why our mission is dedicated to making life bedder. And our journey starts with the Bedderpan!

 

 

 

Thank you for all of your support! With the Bedderpan’s many benefits and with your backing, we hope to make the Bedderpan become the standard bedpan in healthcare. Let’s clean up this mess together.

story:
Do you know that 40 percent of the estimated 125 to 160 billion pounds of food goes to waste every year in the United States? What a distressing number.



Packaging and storage issues are the main cause of most food waste. Why not add a food vacuum sealer to your home kitchen to keep food fresh and lock in taste? It is already helping millions of families to reduce food waste and enjoy a healthier, modern lifestyle.  



So, meet FRESKO V8 - World’s First Intelligent 5 in 1 Food Vacuum Sealer, your new mate in the kitchen. Affordable and reliable, supports universal vacuum bags/vacuum boxes and wine bottles. Store the food in a simple way, and save money right away. 

 

 

  • Made by Unbox Fantasy, a professional crew assemblage from the former editors of tech review media.
  • Check out the new unboxing & hands-on made by Pick Gadgets.










Our mission is food saving and making smart food storage more accessible to everyone. We are dedicated to providing absolute vacuum that ensures your food stays fresher, longer.


To demonstrate the benefits of vacuum sealing, we conducted a long-term experiment using two servings of the same food. One was placed in a standard plastic bag while the other one was vacuum sealed by FRESKO V8. The results speak for themselves.






 

  • Universal Vacuum Bags Compatible 

FRESKO V8 is compatible with most types of vacuum bags on the market. Keep food in the vacuum bag, retain the freshness, and save space in your refrigerator.



 

  • External Vacuum Capable 

FRESKO V8 is compatible with all types of vacuum seal food containers on the market. Use its external vacuum attachment to remove the air from the container before storage. Your food stays fresh and tastes great longer! 




 

  • Prevent Wines From Oxidizing 

FRESKO can even keep the wine fresh and drinkable for a long time. By reducing the oxygen remaining in the bottle after it has been opened, allows it to stay fresh and delicious for an extra 7-14 days.




 

  • Dry Food Vac-Seal Supported 

Use FRESKO V8 to vac-seal dry foods, like nuts and coffee. It keeps moisture away and lets you keep them 5x longer. Your afternoon tea and snacks will taste better than ever.

 




 

  • Moist  Food Vac-Seal Supported 

Use FRESKO V8 to vac-seal moist foods, like beef and vegetables. Lock in the freshness and even cook in the bag for delicious Sous Vide recipes. 






 

  • For Professional Cooking 

FRESKO V8's moist mode is really a perfect way to marinate your food, and it is the first step in sous vide cooking. Instead of using a microwave, you can boil your vac-sealed food. It reheats your food without getting it too mushy or drying it out.

 

  • For Daily Cooking 

FRESKO V8 is the most convenient method of daily cooking. The next time you watch a cooking video on YouTube, you will have all the fresh ingredients that you need, ready to go!




 

  • Vacuum Sealing Made Easy

The biggest problem with ordinary vacuum sealers is that they are too labor-intensive! Too many useless steps slow down the process and waste time. 

 

  • One-Touch To Lock In Freshness 

FRESKO V8 eliminates the multiple manual operations necessary with typical vacuum sealing devices. It makes food storage fast and easy and only requires 5 seconds between continuous sealing jobs, much faster than previous vacuum sealers. 

 

  • We Make Food Vacuum Fun 

The entire process can be completed in three simple steps: Insert the bag, press the button, and FRESKO will do the rest. Intelligent one-touch vac-seal offers true convenience, true automation, and true ease of use.


  • Luminous LED Ring 

FRESKO V8 is designed based on human-computer interaction science. After extensive research about the way in which people work in the kitchen, we make FRESKO V8 more user friendly. The unique luminous LED ring will give you a clear sign of cold and hot, or when it is done. It’s as intuitive as setting your AC. 




 

  • Exquisite Design 

FRESKO V8 has a streamlined structure design and exquisite color that fits perfectly into contemporary design aesthetics and is complementary to other modern appliances. It’s perfect for all kitchens. 




 

  • Magnetic Drip Tray Design

When you are finished,  FRESKO V8's bottom drip tray is easy to clean. The magnetic design ensures no water leakage and allows easy removal and installation.



























We started the design of FRESKO V8 in November 2019, and we built the first demo prototype four months later. 



For the next five months, we repeated sample preparation and testing. We documented our progress with pictures and hope that our efforts can earn your support to help us launch FRESKO V8 to the world through Kickstarter.



We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, messages, and via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!

story:
On July 31, 2012 Leah and Paul welcomed their beautiful, healthy 8lb. 9oz. baby girl Alexa into the world.  She was perfect in every way.  Then the unthinkable happened.  Alexa stopped breathing.  The hospital did their best but Alexa was in a coma being kept alive by machines.  She was moved to a NICU in a specialty hospital but nothing could be done.  Only 42 hours after she was born Alexa left this world and went to heaven.  On top of the heart ache and pain the family is going through they are incuring expenses that no one could plan for.  Travel expences to and from the hospital, medical bills and funeral expenses.

Please join in helping allevaite one concern for this family and donate to help them.  In their sorrow the last thing they need to have to worry about is financial burdnens.  All of this fund will go to helping the family with their unexpected expenses.  Thank you.

story:
Because I know you’ve been there, too, where someone you cared about suffered from irritating, painful and devastating skin conditions.

You may have watched them struggle to find safe, effective and natural solutions that didn’t further irritate the skin or add potentially dangerous toxins to it.

My father went through this struggle when he suffered a debilitating rash during his cancer treatments, and a high-end cream supposedly for “sensitive skin” burned him even further.  I researched what was in the product and learned it was full of potentially harmful chemicals, some even linked to cancer. I was shocked! 

Studies have shown that standard ingredients in the global skincare market have been linked with irritation, dryness, and dullness, as well as more serious concerns like hormone disruption and even cancer. Yet most companies persist in using these questionable ingredients because they’re cheap and readily available. 

When will this stop? Enough is enough. We need to put an end to this, and we need your help.

To honor my father’s legacy, I created CV Skinlabs skincare. This line is 100% free of ingredients tied to cancer, hormone disruption and other health issues, and has been clinically proven  to help repair sensitive skins.   

My vision is to create a safe skincare revolution to deliver non-toxic, clean and effective skincare to those who need it most. This campaign is an effort to help me accomplish just that. 

With your support, we’ll be using every dollar raised in this campaign to accomplish two key objectives:

Deliver a sampling of all CV Skinlabs products to every hospital in the nation, so those who need them most will have access to them. 

  • Research additional solutions and product possibilities to help everyone with fragile and sensitive skin enjoy safe solutions that help repair and restore skin’s natural radiance and health.
  • Maintain communication with our customers and contributors to incorporate valuable feedback into our brand, products, and message.
  • Support like-minded organizations that are pressuring big corporations to change their formulations to be safer for human bodies.

Start a marketing campaign to get CV Skinlabs into cancer centers nationwide, where sensitive skin conditions are common, and people deserve relief.  

  • Educate patients about what products to use in their daily lives and which to avoid—through presentations, lectures, online information sources, and Britta’s book, When Cancer Hits.
  • Extend our educational outreach to create more awareness about the damage chemicals can do in our bodies, our lives, and our world.
  • Expand the brand across the nation to these centers and eventually, globally.


Have you ever lost someone who was extremely important to you? 

If so, you know what a hole it leaves in your heart—and how strong is the drive to honor that person’s life in a meaningful and lasting way. 

That’s how makeup artist and natural beauty expert, Britta Aragon, felt when she lost her father in 2007 after his eight-year battle with cancer. A survivor herself, she had Hodgkin’s lymphoma when she was only 16 years old, but after undergoing chemo treatments, she emerged cancer-free.

Her father would not be so lucky. The courage and fortitude he showed battling five recurrences, however, inspired many around him, most of all, his daughter. When he was gone, Britta wanted more than anything to find a way to honor his spirit.

 

 

 

One of the main issues both Britta and her father suffered while going through cancer treatments was super sensitive, fragile skin. Britta’s father, especially, endured burning, inflamed, and rash-like symptoms that wouldn’t respond to conventional skincare products.

 

Even when Britta used her makeup artist expertise to buy him a high-end cream—supposedly for sensitive skin—it ended up burning and irritating his skin even further. She researched the ingredients and was shocked to find irritating synthetics linked to cancer and hormone disruption!

She immediately set about finding a better alternative. That turned out to be a treasured piece of a neighbor’s aloe plant. Unlike the expensive cream, this simple plant soothed and cooled her father’s skin immediately. Britta knew she was on to something.

“When my father passed away,” Britta said, “I wanted to help others like him who, for whatever reason, couldn’t tolerate the average, chemical-laden products on the market today. I also realized, through my research, that the high levels of chemicals in our products and in the environment were having an adverse effect on our health, so it became extremely important to me that whatever I did would help lessen that toxic load.”

To that end, Britta, did two things:

  1. founded the Cinco Vidas blog—“cinco vidas” means “five lives” in Spanish, in honor of the five times her father renewed his commitment to life.
  2. She wrote When Cancer Hits, the guide she wished she had when she was caring for her father.
  3. and created CV Skinlabs, a new skin care line that would set a new standard of safety, while effectively repairing and nourish sensitive skin back to radiant health.


“I learned that applying the right combinations of bio-compatible ingredients was critical to restoring and healing the skin without irritation,” Britta says. She had every single ingredient toxicologically reviewed before clearing it for use in her formulas, to ensure each one had a 100% clean assessment.

“This was the only way I could make sure that my formulas were truly safe, while clinical testing ensured the formulas worked,” she said.

  We appreciate all contributions!! See all perks on the right hand side. Perks include:
  • CV Skinlabs Products: Perks range from trial-sized to full-sized. Products include:
    • Body Repair Lotion: This luxurious body lotion calms inflammation and delivers long-lasting moisture while leaving behind a radiant glow. Ideal for after-sun dryness and burning, during dry winter months, and to soothe irritation and redness. Makes the perfect gift. A customer must-have! 
    • Rescue + Relief Spray: Spray on instant, cooling relief! Soothes itching, burning, irritated and inflamed skin. Guys, this is great on skin after shaving! Featured in US Weekly, People en Espanol, & Real Simple Magazine.
    • Calming Moisture for Face, Neck & Scalp: This antioxidant-rich moisturizer calms redness and hydrates while repairing skin to create a healthy glow. As seen backstage in NYC Fashion Week 2013.
    • Restorative Skin Balm: 100% natural, non-petrolatum, cure-all balm instantly softens severely dry and chapped skin. Perfect for eczema, scars, lips and cuticles. A favorite among celebrity makeup artists.

 


-100% free of: synthetic fragrances & dyes, parabens, formaldehyde, 1,4-dioxiane, hydroquinone, phthalates, mineral oil/petrolatum, silicones, propylene glycol, SLS/SLES, PEG/PPG, triclosan, disodium EDTA, hydroquinone, talc, MEA-DEA-TEA  or chemical sunscreens.

-all products are infused with our exclusive Tri-Rescue Complex—a unique blend of turmeric, alpha-bisabolol and reishi mushroom that offers a powerful combination of anti-inflammatory, wound-healing and skin-repairing constituents. Working together, these ingredients encourage repair, healing, and the restoration of that youthful glow.

-clinically tested, doctor recommended, no animal testing, natural and organic, and screened by toxicologists to ensure there are no harmful ingredients.

-CV Skinlabs products are perfect for all skin types, and can be used by men, women, and children. The formulas provide soothing relief for many skin conditions, including eczema, chronic dryness, redness, rashes, and dry skin during pregnancy. They can also be used to provide cooling relief after excessive sun exposure, waxing, shaving, radiation treatments, and microdermabrasion or laser treatments. Especially helpful in those with skin made fragile by chemotherapy, diabetes or by taking any type of medication.

For more informatrion visit www.cvskinlabs.com

  • Britta’s Book: You will get a signed copy of Britta’s book, When Cancer Hits, the perfect guide for the newly diagnosed, and for those who need help with the side effects of cancer treatments. This was Britta's labor of love, dedicated to her father, who fought cancer for 8 years.

Actress and cancer-survivor Fran Drescher says, “There are lots of experts in the field, but advice from one who went through it herself is invaluable. I wish this book had existed for my own battle.”

Read the many wonderful amazon reviews on Britta's book here


 

  • Tshirts and tanks: Let everyone know where you stand on safe skin care! T-shirts are the perfect conversation starters, and make great gifts.

Women's tank - sizes: S, M and L with tageline"Beauty and Safety By Choice Not By Chance." COLOR - Black

Men's t-shirt - sizes: S, M, and L with tagline "Dare To Be Aware." COLOR: Grey
